SA15dhnyabpu:3_1: siddhi prāhuḥparāṃ, tasmai pravāce munaye namaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:8_0: sarva eva hi viśiṣṭo janaḥ śāstrārambhe sveṣṭhadevatāstutiṃ kṛtavān /
SA15dhnyabpu:8_4: śrotṛṇāṃ stutipuraḥsarayā pravṛttyā puṇyātiśayotpādanāt pārārthya cālocya buddhasya bhagavataḥ stutimārabdhavān- jayantītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:8_5: anena ślokena buddhasya bhagavata eva pūjā stotrataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:9_0: stotramapi sva- parārthasampattyai sambhāvtīti pūrva svārthasampada bhagavatī darsahyati jayanti jātivyasanetyādinā sugataparyantenaḥ manastamastānabetyādinā parārthasampadam /
SA15dhnyabpu:9_1: jayanti =jayaṃ kurvanti / vāca iti sambandhaḥ / kasya vācaḥ? ityāha- sugatasye ti /
SA15dhnyabpu:9_2: suśabdo 'tra śobhane, atiśaye, apunarāvṛtau ca vartateḥ anekārthatvāt nipātānām /
SA15dhnyabpu:11_0: 'samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapruṣārthasiddhiriti tadvayutpādayate' iti prathamavākyenāsya prakaraṇasya sambandha-prayojana-abhiveyāni,
SA15dhnyabpu:11_2: tathā hi sambandha prayojana abhidheyānāmabhāve prakaraṇaśāstrarmadaṃ prekṣāpūrva[dha] samyagjñānapūrviketyādinā asya prakaraṇasyābhidheya- prayojanamucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:12_0: [ṭi] ghaṭavat / apunarāvṛttyā gata sugataḥ, pradīpavat / kiviśiṣṭasya tasya? ityāha- rāgādayarāteriti /
SA15dhnyabpu:12_1: rāgaśaktirādau / sa ādiryeṣāṃ dveṣādīnāṃ te rāgādayo bhavanti kleśāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:12_2: teṣāmarātiḥ = śatruḥ / yato bhagavatā sarvakleśāḥ niḥśeṣa nirdagdhāḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:13_1: vyasanam= anarthasajananam / jātau vyasanamiti “saptamī' (pā sū 2 1 40) iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:13_2: tatrābhilāṣa iti yāvat / 'devāhaṃ syām', 'manuṣyo 'haṃ syām' ityabhilāṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:13_4: sāmānyana kamasādhanam / paścājjātiśabdasya viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ- jātireva vyasanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:13_5: jātyā vyasanaṃ viśiṣyate / tena jātiśabdasya viśeṣaṇatvāt pūrvanipātaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:13_7: tasya prasūtiḥ= prasavaḥ, utpattiḥ / tasyā hetuḥ= kāraṇam, jagat tasya jagato vijeturiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:13_9: ataeva rāgādayarātiḥ, yata eva nirdagdhakleśo 'to jagato vijeteti /
SA15dhnyabpu:14_0: kiṃviśiṣṭā vāco jayanti? ityāha- manastama ityād /
SA15dhnyabpu:14_1: manasaḥ= vikalpavijñānasya / tṛṣṇā avidayā tama eva / tama iti kṛtvā na gamatayā tamo 'ndhakārī dhaṭādipratibandhaṃ karoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:14_3: manastamasi tānavam, ṣaṣṭhī- samāso vā vacana pramātho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:14_4: manastamastānavamādadhānāḥ=tanutvaṃ kurvāṇāḥ sakalajanasya śruticintābhāvanākrameṇa sugatasya vācaḥ sutra abhidharma vinayasvabhāvāḥ jayanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:14_6: yasmād bhagavatpravacane pramāṇaparicinna upāyo vimukti lakṣaṇaśca upāyo nirdiśyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:14_7: teṣāṃ cāgama upāyopeyayoḥ pramāṇarahitatvāt tato bhagavata eva vāco jayanti,
SA15dhnyabpu:15_3: tataśca kimiha vyākhyeyam?- ityāśaṅkānirāsārtham abhidheyamuktam phalābhāvaśaṅkānirākaraṇārtha prayojanamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:16_0: tatra tad vyutpādayate ityanena abhidheyaṃ prayojanaṃ ca sākṣādukte /
SA15dhnyabpu:16_2: etacca tatra sāmarthyam- samyagjñānapratipādanārtha prakaraṇārambhād arthād prakaraṇamupāya eveti darśitam anyathā yadi upāyo na syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:17_2: tacca vyutpattayātmakaṃ samyagjñānapratipādanamanena kriyata iti prakaraṇamidaṃ tasyārthasya sādhanaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:17_6: tena prakaraṇaṃ sādhanam, samyagjñāna parijñānaṃ ca upāyasādhyamiti sthitiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:17_7: sa ca sādhya sādhanalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇa eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:17_10: phalaṃ ca kāryamiti / tasmāt samyagjñānaparijñānahetoretatprakaraṇārambha iti sthitiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:18_0: athaivaṃ sthite 'pi, yadi kaścit pṛcchati- ko 'rthaḥ samyagjñānabyutpādane? tadeva tāvanniṣprayojanamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:19_0: mā bhūdupadeśaḥ, kimarthamayaṃ śrama iti? tasmādāha- samyagjñānapūrvikāṃ sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiriti /
SA15dhnyabpu:19_2: tatrāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ- yasmāt sarvapuruṣārtha dvividhaṃ hi prakaraṇaśarīram- śabdaḥ arthaśca /
SA15dhnyabpu:20_0: tatra śabdasya svābhidheyapratipādanameva prayojanam, nānyat / atastanna nirūpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:21_2: sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ prayojanaṃ yena syāt prayojana prayojanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:21_3: tena ca prayojana prayojanamākhyātamiti dūṣitam sāmarthyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:22_1: na punaḥ prakaraṇasya śarīra prayojanam? ityāha- dvividhaṃ hītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:22_2: yato dvividhaṃ prakaraṇasya śarīraṃ prakaraṇasya svabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:23_1: tathā śabdasyāpi kimiti na cintyate? ityāha- tatretyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:24_0: tatpratipattaya iti / abhidheyapratipattaye / sabdarbho racanāviśeṣaḥ / apiśabdādarthasambandho 'pi gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:24_3: tacca vyutpāddam / taddhi vyutpādanaṃ prakaraṇād bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:25_3: tadeva ca samyagjñānam / anyathā prakaraṇena yogācāranayanirāsaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:25_4: iṣṭaśca prakaraṇārambhaḥ sautrāntikaḥ yogācārobhayanayānu abhidheyaṃ tu yadi nipprayojanaṃ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:25_6: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā /
SA15dhnyabpu:27_0: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samaygjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:29_0: tathā hi- 'puruṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyamanena prakaraṇena' iti bruvatā samyagjñānamaraya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:29_1: tadvayutpādanaṃ prayojanam, prakaraṇaṃ cedamupāyo vyutpādanasya- ityukta bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:30_2: abhidheyaṃ, prayojanaṃ ca vaktuṃ sākṣāt samartham /
SA15dhnyabpu:30_3: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sākṣāt sāmarthyād darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:31_0: parīkṣeti / parīkṣyate 'nayeti parīkṣā, śāstramucyate / aneneti / ādivākyena / yasmādityādinā samudāyārtha darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:32_0: nanu ca yatrābhidheyaprayojanaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttāvaṅga tathā samvandhādīnyapi,
SA15dhnyabpu:32_1: atastāni kimiti na kathyante? ityāha- asminniti /
SA15dhnyabpu:32_2: asminnabhidheyaprayojane kathite tānyapi sāmarthyāt kathitāni bhavantītyarhtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:32_3: abhidheya eva bhāgaḥ= aṃśaḥ, sambandhādirāśeḥ / tasya prayojanaṃ kathayatītyarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:32_4: tad darśayati / abhidheyaprayojanameva sakṣād vācyatayā nirdiśyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:33_0: na caikena vākyenārthatrayaṃ sākṣāchakyate darśayitumiti darśayati- na tvidamityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:34_0: ekaṃ tvittyādivākyaṃ prādhānyenaikaṃ vadadabhidheyavyutpattiprayojanasambandhārthatrayaṃ pratipadayati tatra tadityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:34_2: nanu ca taddhāavnārtham / tasmādubhayanayasaṃgrahādavisaṃvādaka jñānameva samyagjñānamiti bodhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:36_2: sarva iti sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭa laukika lokottara heyopādeyopekṣaṇīyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:36_5: lokottarastu duḥkhātītaḥ / heyaḥ aniṣṭaḥ, ahi kaṇṭaka viṣa śūlādilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:36_6: upādeya iṣṭaḥ, strak candana vasanāśana tatra tad ityābhidheyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:37_0: tathā hi- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanamanviṣya pravartante /
SA15dhnyabpu:37_2: śrotṛbhiśca kimartha śrūyate?- iti saṃśaye vyutpādanaṃ prayojanamabhidhauyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:37_3: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānāmātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartu prakaraṇamidaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:37_4: śiṣyaiścācāryaprayuktāmātmano vyutpattimiccadbhiḥ prakaraṇamidaṃ śrūyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇa śravaṇayo prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:38_0: sambandhapradarśanapadaṃ tu na bidyate / sāmarthyādeva tu sa pratipattavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:39_0: vyutpattiḥ kriyata ityevaṃ yujyate vaktum kimiti atdvayutpādyate iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:39_2: atreti prakaraṇe / vakturiti śāstrakartu śrotuśca prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ vintyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_0: yasmād dvayorapi vaktṛśrotrostatra prakaraṇe prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇāsyo vyāpārau staḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:40_1: kimiti punastayoḥ karaṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ cintyate? ityāha- tathā hītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_3: yasmādanena samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayate ityatra vākye vyutpattikriyāniṣpattau karaṇaśravaṇakriyādvayakartavyatayā praviṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_4: tacca vyutpattikaraṇa śāstrakārasyaiva nānyasyeti ṇicā nidarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_5: yasmāt samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyamānān śiṣyān prerayati- vyutpāditaṃ samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyadhvam iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_8: na bhājanādīnām / yadyapi tairvinā vyutpādanaṃ na bavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:40_9: tathāpi na tāni vyutpādakāniḥ teṣāṃ śiṣyaviṣaye prerakatvābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_10: śiṣyaiścetyādi / yasmāchiṣyā ācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimātmanaḥ sambandhinī kartumichanti yataste pracidyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_11: tasmāt tat prakaraṇaṃ taiḥ śrūyate iti śravaṇasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_13: anyathā asādhāraṇavyāpāro vakturvyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:40_14: śiṣyāṇāṃ śravaṇavyāpāraśca / yasmāt sarva eva prayojakaparatantro pāna śayyāsanalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:40_17: tathāhi- pratyakṣādijñānena virdhārya śūla viṣa kaṇṭha kādikaṃ pariharati puṣpamālyādikamādatte,
SA15dhnyabpu:41_0: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānavyutpādanāya prakaraṇamidamārabdhavatā ayamevipāyo nānya iti darśita evopāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:42_0: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāguktānyapi abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhirna gṛhyante,
SA15dhnyabpu:43_0: satyam aśrute prakaraṇe kathitānyapi na niścauyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:43_2: saṃśayācca pravartante / arthasaṃśayo 'pi hi pravṛtyaṅga prekṣāvatām /
SA15dhnyabpu:44_0: bhavati, asatiṇici śiyyā aprayojyāḥ / ye cāprayojyāste svatantrāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:44_1: svatantrāṇāṃ cācāryaprayukta vyutpattimaniccatāṃ śravaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ śravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyate?- iti syitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:44_2: nanu ca yathābhidheyavyutpādanaprayojanayorapoddhāreṇa pratipādakapadaṃ kathaṃ sambandhasyāpi kimīt na kathitam? ityāha- sambandhapradarśanapadaṃ tvityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:44_3: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇaya nītyopāyaḥ vyutpādanam= upeyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:44_5: sa ca pratīyata iti na padāntareṇa kathitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:46_0: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ prabṛttau tadasaṅgata emveti manyamānaścodayati- nanvityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:46_2: sa pramāṇe pravartate / na cādivākye prayojanādinā kathitena śāstraśravaṇāt prāgvartate śāstram,
SA15dhnyabpu:47_2: yo hi samaygjñānārthī sa tathābhutaṃ śāstrakartu rādivākyaṃ śrutvātatra saṃśete,
SA15dhnyabpu:47_5: saṃśayācca pravṛtiḥ, ataeva śāstrakāreṇaiva sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiriti sarvapuruṣārthasādhakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:47_7: tena sarvapuruṣārthasiddhau niścitameva samyagjñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti pradarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:47_8: itiśabdaḥ vyākhyātaṇāṃ hi vacana krīḍādyarthamanyathāpi sambhāvyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:47_9: śastrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītabhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:47_10: nāpi pravṛttim / atasteṣu saṃśayo yuktaḥ / anukteṣu tu pratipattṛbhirniṣprayojanamabhidheyaṃ sambhāvyetāsya prakaraṇasya,
SA15dhnyabpu:48_0: etāsu cānarthasambhāvanāsu ekasyāmapyanarthasambhavanāyām na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
SA15dhnyabpu:48_3: iti prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgamarthasambhāvanāṃ kartu sambandhādīnyabhidhīyanta iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:49_0: yujyate vaktum, nākhyānakartreti / tena yaduktaṃ kenacid- 'vyākhyānakārā eva prayojanādīni pratipādayaisaynti' iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:50_0: utpaśyāma ityādinaitad darśayati- yadyapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:50_2: nanu ca vādhakasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt samyagjñānavyutpattyarthī vināpi āvidacanena saṃśayānastatra pravartate- iti kimādivākyena tatroktena? ityāha- anukteṣvityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:50_3: evaṃ manyate- yo hyamūḍhaḥ, taṃ prati na kartavyameva / yo hi kākadantaparīkṣādiśāstraṃ dṛṣṭvā prayojanādirahitam,
SA15dhnyabpu:50_7: kathite ca vacane śāstrakāreṇa tadanurodhād vacanādarthasaṃśayo jāyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:51_1: ato vā prakaraṇādanyasya prakaraṇasya laghutaropāyatāṃ sambhāvyāsya prakaraṇasyasāratayā anupāyatā syādityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:52_0: evaṃ samudāyena vākyasya tātparya vyākhyāyāvayavārtha darśayitumāha- avisaṃvādakamityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:52_1: 'avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ' iti bruvatā ṭīkākṛtā arthāvabodhakaṃ jñānaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitam,
SA15dhnyabpu:52_3: athāpi viparītaṃ jñānaṃ kaiścit parikalpitaṃ samyaktvena,
SA15dhnyabpu:53_0: tasmādityarthe / yattado nityasaṃbandhau / tena yasmāt sarvapuruṣārthasiddhau samyagjñānaṃ pūrvabhāvi,
SA15dhnyabpu:55_2: nānyat / tathā hi- na jñānaṃ janayad artha prāpayati,
SA15dhnyabpu:55_5: na hi puruṣaṃ haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:56_2: prāpitaścarthaḥ / tathā ca sati arthādhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:56_5: tenaiva pravartita pruruṣaḥ, prāpitaścārthaḥ / tatreva ca arthe kimanyena jñānenādhikaṃ kāryam /
SA15dhnyabpu:57_0: tatra yo 'rtho dṛṣṭatvena jñāttaḥ sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:57_2: tasya ekasminnevārthe trayāṇāṃ jñānātāṃ pradarśaka pravartaka prāpakabhedena prāmāṇyamiṣṭaṃ pareṇa,
SA15dhnyabpu:57_3: tannirākartu māha, pradarśite cārtha ityādi / pradarśite cārthe prathamena darśakena jñānena yad dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivārthe puruṣasya pravarttakam,
SA15dhnyabpu:57_10: yat pradarśakamādāvutpannamarthe jñānaṃ tadeva pravṛttiviṣayaṃ karoti,
SA15dhnyabpu:57_12: na tu dvitīyaṃ jñānam, ādayenaiva pravṛttiviṣayayogyīkṛtatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:58_4: na prāpayati / evaṃ satyanyat pradarśakapramāṇamḥ anyat pravartanādikaphalam? na caivam,
SA15dhnyabpu:59_0: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare pravartaka-prāpakajñane na bhavataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:59_2: evaṃ manyate- adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye karttavye 'nupayogitvam,
SA15dhnyabpu:60_0: kathaṃ samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ ko vāsau? ityāha- ata eveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:60_2: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā cārthādhigatyā kṛta iti samāpto tadvayutpādyata iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:60_3: atra taditi samyagjñānaṃ yojanīyam napusaṃkaliṅgena svarupanirdeśāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:61_0: pradarśakaṃ pratyakṣam tasmād dṛṣṭatayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣadarśitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:64_0: ābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyāmanyena ca jñānena darśito 'rthaḥ kaścid atyanta vipartyastaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:64_1: yathā- marīcikāsu jalamḥ sa cāsatvāt prāptumaśakyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:64_2: kaścidaniyato bhāvābhāvayoḥ, yathā- saṃśayārthaḥ / na ca bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ yukto 'rtho jagatyastiḥ tataḥ prāptumaśakyastādṛśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:65_3: pravartitaḥ puruṣa iti / pravartanayogyatvāt pravartita ityucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:65_4_0: prāpaṇayogyatvāt prāpitaḥ / evam sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāne svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī
SA15dhnyabpu:65_4_1: samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha- tatra yo 'rtha ityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:65_8: etaduktaṃ bhavati- pratibhāsamānārthavyavasāyaṃ kurvat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ samvādakanityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:65_10: liṅgadarśanam=liṅgajñānam / tacca vahnayavyabhivāridhūmaniścayanaṃ sāmānyena sādhyābinābhāvi ca smaraṇajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:65_11: yathā dhūmaṃpratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatra ayaṃ vahnijaḥ iti smaraṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:65_14: yathā atratyo dhūmo vahnijaḥ iti jānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:65_16: anumānasya tuliṅgadarśanāt svaviṣaye niścayātmanotpattireva niścayavyāpāra iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:66_0: tathā ce yādinā anayordaśitaṃ vyāpāraṃ spaṣṭayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:66_1: ata ete pramāṇe nānyadvijñānam ityevaṃ bruvatā ete eva samyagjñāne nānyāni śabdādīni /
SA15dhnyabpu:66_3: yathaite pramāṇe, saśayādijñānaṃ na tathā pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:67_1: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā pratyakṣānumāne svenasvena pramāṇenopadarśitārthasya prāpake,
SA15dhnyabpu:67_3: sarveṇa cāliṅgajena vikalpena vinyāmakamadṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhavābhāvayo raniyata evārtho darśayitavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:68_1: bhāvābhāvāniyataṃ cārtha darśa yat apramāṇam anyad vijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:70_3: bhinnakālam, bhinnadeśaṃ ca / viruddhadharmasaṃsargāddhi anyad vastu /
SA15dhnyabpu:71_0: yasmādanyākāravadvastugrāhi nākārāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam yathā prītaśaṅkhagrāhi śukle śaṅkha /
SA15dhnyabpu:71_1: deśāntarasthagrāhi ca na deśāntarasthe pramāṇam yathā- kuñcikāvivaradiśasthāyāṃ maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇigrāhi jñānaṃ nāpavarakasye maṇau /
SA15dhnyabpu:71_2: kālāntarayyuktagrāhi ca na kālāntaravarti vastuni pramāṇam yathā ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ ardharātrakāle vastuni pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:72_0: nanu ca mā bhūt saṃśaryāvaparyajñanayoḥ prāmāṇyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:72_1: tathābhūtasyārthasyāsattvāditiḥ yat punaḥ iha kūpe jalam iti jñānaṃ tat pramāṇāntaraṃ kimiti na bhavati? na tāvat pratyakṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:73_0: evaṃ manyate- yadayapi sākṣāt saṃśayajñānaṃ na pratīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:73_1: yastu saṃśayavikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalam ityevañjātīyasyaḥ tathāpi niyāmakaṃ liṅgamantareṇa tadapramāṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:73_2: niyatārthāpariccedāt / tataścāyamarthaḥ- syāt kadācit kūpe jalam iti taccaivaṃ svarūpam,
SA15dhnyabpu:73_4: yat punastatra pravṛttena kadācijjalaṃ labhayate tajjñānāntarāditi viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ pratipāditam /
SA15dhnyabpu:74_0: nanu ca yadayapi saṃśayādīnāmupadarśitasyārthasya prāpakatvaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:74_1: kiṃ tāni na vyutpādayante? ityāha- arthakriyārthibhiścetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:76_0_0: nanu ca deśaniyatam, ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayitu śakyam yatkālaṃ tu pariccinnaṃ tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum? nocyate- yasminneva
SA15dhnyabpu:76_1: ayo hi darśanakālaḥ, anyaśca prāptikālaḥ, kintu yatkālaṃ pariccinnaṃ tadeva tena prāpaṇīyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:77_2: kāraṇaśabdopādāne tu pruṣārthasiddhaḥ sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ gamyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:78_0: dvividhaṃ ca samyagjñānam, arthakriyānirbhāsam, arthakriyāasmarthe ca pravartakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:78_2: tacca pūrvamātram, na tu sākṣāt kāraṇam / samyagjñāne hi sati pūrvadṛṣṭasmaraṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:79_2: evaṃ manyate- ebhirupadarśitasyārthasya pītākārasya kuñjikāvivarasthasya maṇairniyatadeśasya,
SA15dhnyabpu:79_5: ata eva tānyapramāṇānyeva, na samyagjñānānīti / yadayapyetānyabhrāntagrahaṇasya vyāvarttyāni tatraivābhrāntagrahaṇaprastāve darśayitavyāni,
SA15dhnyabpu:80_0: nanu cetyādi / evaṃ manyate codakaḥ- deśākrābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ śakyatvāda bhavatvanyākārasyānyadeśasya ca prāptāvapramāṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:80_1: na tvanyakālasya, niyata kālasya cāprāpteḥ kṣaṇikatvāda bhagavānām /
SA15dhnyabpu:80_2: tataśca yathā satyanīle nīlajñānasyānyo grāhyakālo 'nyaśca prāpyakālaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:81_0: nocyate ityādinā siddhāntavādī tvevaṃ manyate- satyaṃ kṣaṇabhedena vastuno bhedo 'styevaḥ kintu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmānyalakṣaṇamucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:81_1: api tu santānāpekṣayā / tataśca nīlādo ya eva santānaḥ pariccinno nīlajñānena,
SA15dhnyabpu:81_2: sa eva tena prāpitaḥ / tena pramāṇaṃ nīlajñānam / na tathā sthūlakālabhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaptnajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:81_3: na prāptikālabhedenaḥ, santānaikādhyavasāyāyogāt / santānagatamekatvaṃ draṣṭavyamityanena niścayapravṛttyorhetuhetumadbhāvaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:82_1: kathaṃ pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇe vartate? ityāha- kāryādityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:82_2: kāraṇaśabda eva kasmānnakṛtaḥ? ityāha- kāraṇaśabda ityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:82_3: kima arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ tu yadyapi sākṣātprāptiḥ tathāpi tanna parīkṣyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:82_5: yat parīkṣyate / arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāte sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:82_7: atastanna parīkṣaṇīyam / tasmāt parīkṣārhamasākṣāt kāraṇaṃ samyagjñānamādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:83_0_0: puruṣasyārthaḥ puruṣārthaḥ / arthyate iti arthaḥ, kāmyate iti yāvat / heyo 'rthaḥ, upādeyo vā / heyo hyartho hātumiṣyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:83_0_1: upādeyo 'pi upādātum / na ca heyopādeyābhyāmanyo rāśirasti /
SA15dhnyabpu:83_1: upekṣaṇīyo hyanupādeyatvād heya nantakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:83_2: yadapekṣayā vyavahitasya grahaṇārtha pūrvaśabdagrahaṇa kṛtam? ityāha- dvividhānityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:84_1: nahi tat kāraṇajñānam, evaṃm tuyujyate vaktum- yat sādhananirbhāsyanantaraṃ jñānamarthakriyānirbhāsajñānamupajanayati,
SA15dhnyabpu:84_9: tat prāpitaheyopādayānuṣṭhāan vyavhārāpekṣayā pravartakamiti vyavahitaṃ sādhananirbhāsajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:85_0: yadyevama, anantarameva kimiti na parīkṣayate? ityāha- aytraiva hītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:85_2: tadeva parīkṣyate / na cānantarasādhanajñāne sandehaḥ tadanantaraṃ sukhaḥdukhapratibhāsajñānodayāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:85_3: tayoranubhave sati sādhanajñānāt pravatituṃ vā yujyata iti na praikṣārham /
SA15dhnyabpu:86_0: arthyata ityādi / artha yācñāyām ityasya karmaṇi ghañ /
SA15dhnyabpu:87_1: tena hya vaṃ vyākayātam arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:87_3: tasya siddhirniṣpattiḥ iti / taccāyuktam yasmādarthasya dārupākāderna samyagjñānānniṣpattiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:87_4: kiṃ tarhi? svahetoreva vahnayādeḥ dharmottaravyākhyāne tu heyopādeyārthaviṣayā yā siddhiḥ= anuṣṭhitiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:87_6: amumevārtha darśayiṣyati heyasya ca hānamanuṣthānam iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:88_2: tasy asiddhiḥ- hānam, upādānaṃ ca / hetunibandhanā hi siddhiutpattirucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:88_4: heyasya ca hānamanuṣṭhānam, upādeyasya copādānam / tato heyopādeyayorhānopādānalakṣaṇānuṣṭhitiḥ siddhirucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:89_2: na tu prakārakātsnrye / tato nāyamarthaḥ- dviprakārāpi siddhiḥ samyagjñānanibandhanaiveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:89_3: api tvayamarthaḥ- yā kācit siddhiḥ sā sarvā kṛtsnaivāsau samyagjñānanibandhaneti /
SA15dhnyabpu:89_8: pradarśitaṃ cāprāpayat miethyajñānam aprāpakaṃ ca kathamarthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt tasmād yanmithyājñānaṃ na tato 'rthasiddhiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:89_10: ata eva samyagjñānaṃ yatnato vyutpādanīyam yatastadeva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:90_0: tato yāvadū brūyāta-yā kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ sā samyagjñānanibandhanaiveti,
SA15dhnyabpu:90_3: tadayamarthaḥ- yasmāt samyagityāha- na ca heyetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:90_4: evaṃ manyate- satyamasti, kintu tasyānupādeyatvād heyatvameveti na pṛthakkathanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:90_5: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścit- heyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvāt kathanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:90_7: tat pratyuktam / amymevārtha vyācaṣṭe uttareṇa granthena /
SA15dhnyabpu:91_3: jñānādeva, api tu mithyājñānādapiv kākatālīyetyāśaṅkaya parihutam /
SA15dhnyabpu:91_8: kātsnrye varatte, sarva brahmaṇā sṛṣṭam iti, tenāyamarthaḥ- yavattī kṛtsnārthasiddhirhānopādānalakṣaṇā,
SA15dhnyabpu:93_0: tato yāvad brūyādityādinopasaṃhāravyājenevaśabdena prayuktenāvadhāraṇārthavācinā yāvānarthastāvāneva sarvaśabdena prayuktena kṛtsnārthavācinā bhavatīti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:97_0: jñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ tasmāt tat samyagjñānaṃ vyupādayate /
SA15dhnyabpu:100_0: caturvidhā cātra vipratipattiḥ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇa gocara phalaviṣayā /
SA15dhnyabpu:101_1: tasyāḥ prādhānyāt taccabdena sambandho yukto na samyagjñanasya? ityāha- yadayapītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:101_2: evaṃ manyate- śabdārthī hi dvividhaḥ śābdaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:101_5: nanu ca kimidaṃ jñānasya vyutpādanam? ki jñānasyotpādanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:101_6: utadoṣāpanayanam, atha svarūpakathanamiti? na tāvadutpādnamanena prakaraṇena kriyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:101_7: svahetorevotpatteḥ / nāpi doṣāpanayanam, na hayanena prakaraṇena doṣo 'panetu śakyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:101_8: akārakatvādasya / nāpi jñāpayitum, avidayamānatvāda doṣāsya / nāpi svarūpakathanaṃ yujyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:101_9: niṣprayojanatvāt prakaraṇasya? ityāśaṅkayāha- vyutpādayata iti vipratipattinirākaraṇeneti /
SA15dhnyabpu:102_0: evaṃ manyate- vipratipattinirākaraṇadvāreṇa samyagjñānasvarūpaṃ jñāpyate 'nena prakaraṇeneti /
SA15dhnyabpu:105_0: svarūpavipratipattiryathā- keṣāñcit pratyakṣaṃ savikalpakam / keṣāñcit nirvikalpakamīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:107_2: tasmāt tādṛśavipratipatticatuṣṭhayanirākaraṇena srvathā abhāntatayā samyagjñanasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:108_0: tatra ca prathamameva saṅkhayāvipratipattinirākaraṇārthamuktam- dvividhaṃ samyagjñānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:109_1: vyaktibhede ca pradarśite prativyaktiniyataṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇamākhyātuṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:109_2: apradarśite tu vyaktibhede sakalavyaktyanuyāyi samyagjñānalakṣaṇamekaṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum /
SA15dhnyabpu:109_4: apradarśite tu vyaktibhedātmake saṃkhyāhede lakṣaṇabhedasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:110_1: pratigatamāścitam akṣam / “ atyādyaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayā” iti samāsaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:110_2: prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāseṣu paravalliṅgapratiṣedhāt abhidheyavalliṅge sati sarvaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:111_0: nanu ca samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇe kathite sati paścāt tadbhedaḥ pradarśayitu yujyate- ityambhutalakṣaṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ dvividhamiti,
SA15dhnyabpu:111_1: tat kimityādāveva pradarśitam? ityāha vyaktibhede cetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:111_2: evaṃ manyate- satyamevameva, kintvatra saṃkhyābhede 'kathite samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇameva na śakyate kathayitum,
SA15dhnyabpu:111_3: ataḥ pratyakṣasyānyallakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ śakyate kathayitumityato lakṣaṇāṅgamevādau saṃkhyābhedakathanamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:111_4: nanu ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti nirdeśād dvividhamiti labdham,
SA15dhnyabpu:111_5: kimartha dvividhagrahaṇam? ucyate dvividhameva samyagjñānam ityavadhāraṇārtham,
SA15dhnyabpu:112_0: asati dvitvakathane pratyakṣānumāne tāvat sambhavati'nyānyapi pramāṇāni bhaviṣyantīti syādāśaṅkā /
SA15dhnyabpu:115_0: kodṛśaṃ ca dvaivivyam? kathaṃ na vā caturvidhaṃ jñānamiti? ataḥ viśeṣeṇoktam pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:115_1: akṣeṣu āśritaṃ pratyakṣam / nipāto 'yaṃ jñānaviṣayasya pratyakṣakārakatvaṃ sūcayita /
SA15dhnyabpu:115_2: yathā- gamanena gauriti / tatra gamanaṃ gotvasyopalakṣaṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:115_4: tathātrāpi indriyāśritatvena jñānaviṣayasya pratyakṣakārakatvasūcanāt pratyakṣacatuṣṭhayameva pratyakṣatvenāśrīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:116_0: moyate 'neneti mānam / pariccedakamiti śeṣaḥ / anuśabdaṃ ānantaryabodhakaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:117_2: tadeva śabdasya pravṛttinimittam tataścayatkiñcidarśasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:118_2: na mānasādi / yathā gaccatoti gauḥ iti gamanakriyāyāṃ vyutpādito 'pi gośabdo gamanakriyopalakṣitamekārthasamavetaṃ gotvaṃpravṛttinimittī karoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:118_3: yathā ca gaccatyagaccati ca gavi gośabdaḥ siddho bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:119_0: mīyate 'neneti mānam / karaṇasādhanena māna śabdena sārūpyalakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇamabhidīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:119_2: gṛhote pakṣadharma, smṛte ca sādhyasādhanasambandhe 'numānaṃ pravartate iti paścātkālabhāvi ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:120_0: pratyakṣasy, tataśva pratyakṣā buddhiḥ, pratyakṣo ghaṭaiti na syātḥ idameva syātpratyakṣājñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:120_1: pratyakṣaṃ kuṇḍaṃ ceti / gatisamāse tu sarvaligatā bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:120_2: nanu ca pratigatamakṣamityasyāṃ vyutpattāvakṣāśritasyaividnriyajñanasya pratyakṣaśabdavācyatā syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:120_3: na yonijñānādaḥ, teṣābhakṣānāśrayāt? ityāśaṅkayāha- akṣāśritatvaṃ cetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:121_1: tanna sārūpyamātram, anyathā virūpālligādanumeye jñānamiti viruddhayeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:121_2: apapi paścānmānamanumānamityavyayībhāvasamāse pūrvaccodayamudbhāvya gatisamāsa āśrayitavyaḥ- anugataṃ mānamanumānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:122_1: athadi viṣayabhedo gamyate / yathā tayovibhaktibhedaḥ, tathā tayorviṣayabedho 'pīti śeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:123_0: ca śabdaḥ samuccāyārthaḥ / tena pratyaksānumānayoḥ samabalatvasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:123_1: yathā pratyakṣāmarthenotpannaṃ sad abhrāntamiti pramāṇaṃ bhavativ tathānumānamapi tādātmyadutpattibhyāmarthapratibandhādabhrāntamiti tat pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:123_2: etena yaduvata kaiścit- sarveṣu pramāṇeṣu mukhyaṃ pratyakṣam iti tannirastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:124_0: abhrāntatvamubhayorapi samānameva / pratipāditaṃ hi kenacit pratyakṣasya mukhyatvam // 3 //
SA15dhnyabpu:125_4: tena kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ yad bhavati tadeva pratyakṣaṃ viditavyam ityartha ukto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:127_1: tato 'yaṃ vākyārthaḥ- tatra tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoriti samudāyanirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:127_3: cakāraḥ pratyakṣānumānayostulyavalatvaṃ samuccinotītyādinā yaduvataṃ śabarasvāmiprabhṛtibhiḥ- pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nānumānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:127_4: tathā coktaṃ mīsāṃsābhāsye- pratyakṣe valīyasi kathamanumānam iti tat prayuktam yato dvayorapi svavyāpāre tulyabalatbam /
SA15dhnyabpu:127_7: tābhyāmevaṃ vyākhyātam- pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti bhinnavibhaktinirdeśo 'rthād viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:127_8: yathānayovribhaktibhinnā, evaṃ viṣayo 'pi bhinnaḥ iti, etaccāyuktam yasmād ekavibhaktinirdeśe kriyamāṇe cakāreṇa tulyabalatvaṃ na pradarśitaṃ syāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:129_2: anena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyānaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandharūpaṃ pratyuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:129_5: yadayapyanvarthasaṃjñayā kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yadbhrāntaṃ ca tatpratyakṣamiti śakyate yathārtha kathayitum,
SA15dhnyabpu:129_6: tathāpi na svarūpaṃ pratyakṣasya kathitaṃ syat,
SA15dhnyabpu:129_7: yato 'nyadapi pratyakṣasya svarūpamartha avayavārthastu- kalpanābhya apoḍhamiti kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15dhnyabpu:129_8: kalpanāviyuktamiti śeṣaḥ / yaddhā- kalpanayā apoḍhaṃ kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15dhnyabpu:129_9: kalpanāvivarjitamiti śeṣaḥ / na bhrāntamabhrāntam / prāpakaviṣaye 'visaṃvādakamiti śeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:131_2: aśrāntatvaṃ vidhīyate / yat tad bhavatām asmākaṃ cārtheṣu sākṣātkāri jñāni prasiddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:132_1: kimanyat pratyakṣasya jñānasya rūpamavaśiṣyate yat pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sad anūdyeteti,
SA15dhnyabpu:132_2: yasmādindriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyartheṣu sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ pratyakṣaśabda vācyaṃ sarveṣāṃ prasiddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:133_0: sākṣātkārādikamastīti / lakṣyalakṣaṇetukathite yathārtha kathitaṃ bhavati yat kiñcit pratyakṣaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntamiti pratipattavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:133_4: na cānityatvaṃ saṃjñeti gamyata iti saṃjñā lakṣaṇakaraṇayorbhedaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:134_1: tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgayāḥ yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdaya lakṣaṇavidhīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:134_3: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇasanūdaya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:134_4: aythā- yaḥ śikhāvān sa parivrājakaḥ iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:134_6: viparītavidhānamityanyadapi asminmate dūṣaṇaṃ dattvaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyā ṭīkākṛtteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:135_0: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na sambhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:135_2: aythā- śikhayā parivrājakaḥ ityatra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyate? ityāśaṅkyāha- yat tad bavatāmityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:135_3: evaṃ manyate- yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na siddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:137_0: prāpakaviṣaye upādeyam, na tu ālambanaviṣaye / yadyālambanaviṣaye abhrāntatvamabhyupagamyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:137_2: yogācārā hi sarvamālambanajñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ kalpanāyāḥ apoḍham apeta kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15dhnyabpu:139_0: tatrāsati abhrāntagrahaṇe gaccadvṛkṣadarśanādi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvāt syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:139_1: tato hi pravṛttena vṛkṣamātramavāpyate iti saṃvādakatvāt samyagjñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:140_1: abhrāntamarthakriyākṣame ca vasturūpa ityādināvisaṃvādo 'rtho 'bhrāntaśabdasya na sambhavatīti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:140_3: sanniveśopādhivarṇātmakamityanenaitad darśayati- varṇādanyat saṃsyānādikaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ nāstīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:141_0: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyakhyā padadvayavyavacedakathanarūpā dūṣitā /
SA15dhnyabpu:141_1: tena tvevaṃ vyākhyātam- abhrāntamiti yad visaṃvādi na bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:141_2: evaṃ satyanumāsyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham /
SA15dhnyabpu:141_3: yadyevaṃ vyākhyāyate, ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntam ityevamucyamāne sarva pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacit pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:142_0: tathā cāha- sarvamālambane bhrāntaṃ muktvā tathāgatajñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:142_3: na vyavaccedārtham / ata evācāryamanumāpayatā dharmotatreṇa padadvayaṃ vyākhyāmiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_0: nanu ca bhavataḥ pakṣe 'pi kimiti vyavaccedārtha na bhavati? ityāha- etaccetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_2: api tvarthakriyākṣame vasturūpa ālamabane yanna bhrāmyati tadabhrāntaśabdena gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_3: nanūkraṃ yogācāramatamasaṃgṛhītaṃ syāditi? ucyate bāhyanayena sautāntrikamatānusāreṇācāryeṇa lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtamityadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_4: yogācāramatena tvabhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamḥ saṃvādakasya samyagjñānasya prastutatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_5: anyavyāvartyasyābhavāt / tasmādabhrāntagrahaṇenānumāne niraste kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇamadhikaṃ siddhivipratipatti nirākaroti /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_7: asti cātra manyante / tataśca prakaraṇārambhastannayanirākaraṇārthaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_11: na ca pramāṇāntaramasti / ato gaccad{bri}kṣadarśanādi mithyājñānam- ityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_12: yadi mithyājñānam, kathaṃ tato vṛkṣāvāptiḥ? iti cet,
SA15dhnyabpu:143_13: na tato vṛkṣāvāptiḥ / nānādeśagāmī hi vṛkṣastena pariccinnaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_15: tato yaddeśo gaccad vṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ taddeśo nāvāpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:143_16: yaddeśaścāvāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti tasmāt kaścidartho 'vāpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:144_0: vipratipattiḥ / tathā hi momāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ yathā nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ tathā jātyādiyojanājñānamapi samyagjñānamindriyajamḥ upadarśitasyārthasya prāpaṇāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:147_1: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamaśinī //
SA15dhnyabpu:147_2: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamadṛte /
SA15dhnyabpu:148_0: tathā naiyāyikādīnāṃ savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamiti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:148_1: tathā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirvikalpe siddhe 'grahaṇamatiricyamāna dvicandrajñānādeḥsamyagjñānādhikaraṇa eva nirastatvād vipratipattinirāsārthatvameva bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:148_3: gaccadvṛkṣadarśanajñānaṃ cālātacakrajñānamabhrāntamapi samyagjñānamiccantiḥ vastuno 'bhrāntatvāt pītākārādeśca bhrāntatvāda- ityasti vipratipatti,
SA15dhnyabpu:148_5: tathā sati abhrāntagrahaṇa ityādinābhrāntaviṣayasya vipratipattiviṣayaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:151_2: abhilapyate 'neneti abhilāpaḥ=vācyaḥ tathā abhrāntagrahaṇenāpyanumāne nivartite kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham /
SA15dhnyabpu:151_4: pratyakṣaṃ tu grāhya rūpe na viparyastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:152_0: na tvavisaṃvādakamabhrāntimiha grahītavyam yataḥ samyagjñānameva pratyakṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:152_1: nānyat / tatra samyagjñānatvādevāvisaṃvādakatve labdhe punaravisaṃvādakagrahaṇaṃ niṣprayojanameva /
SA15dhnyabpu:152_2: evaṃ hi vākyārthaḥ syāt- pratyakṣākhyaṃ yadavisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhamavisaṃvādakaṃ ceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:152_4: tasmād grāhya'rthakriyākṣame vasturūpe yadaviparyastaṃ tadabhrāntamiha veditavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:153_0: kīdṛśī panaḥ kalpaneha gṛhyate? ityāha- abhilāpetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:153_2: vācakaḥ śabdaḥ / abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ abhilāpasaṃsargaḥ= ekasmin jñāne 'bhidheyākārasyābhidhānākāreṇa saha ghrāhyākāratayā milanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:153_3: tato yadaikasmin jñāne 'bhidheyābhidhānayorākārau sanniviṣṭau bhavataḥ tadā tathā bhrāntagrahaṇenetyādinā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇadya vipratipattinirāsārthatvaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:153_6: tasyārthasma grahaṇe doṣaṃ darśayati- na tvavisaṃvādakamityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:154_0: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanetyādinā kalpanābahutvāt kasyāḥ kalpanāyā grahaṇamiti kalpanāviśeṣamajānan pṛccati /
SA15dhnyabpu:154_1: tathā hi- vaibhāṣikā indriyavijñānaṃ vitarka vicāra caitasikasamprayuktaṃ kalpanāmiccanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:154_2: yogācāramatena ca tathāgatajñānamadvayaṃ muktvā sarvajñānaṃ grahyagrāhakatvena vikalpitaṃ kalpanā /
SA15dhnyabpu:154_4: abhilāpetyādinā śabdasaṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇaṃ nāgamaparipaṭhitānāmiti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:154_10: arthasāmānyam / tadeva hi anvayavyatirekavattvād vyāptatvād abhilāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:154_12: abhilāpasaṃsargasya yogyo 'bhidheyākārābhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā tathoktā /
SA15dhnyabpu:155_1: yathā- vyutpanna saṃketasya ghaṭārthakalpanā ghaṭaśabdasaṃsṛṣṭārthāvabhāsā bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:155_2: kācittu abhilāpenāsaṃsṛṣṭāpi abhilāpasaṃsargayogyābhāsā bhavatiḥ yathā- bālakasyāvyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā /
SA15dhnyabpu:155_3: tatra abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā kalpanā ityuktāvavyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā na saṃgṛhyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:155_5: yadayapi abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā na bhavati tadaharjātasya bālakasya kalpanā,
SA15dhnyabpu:155_7: yā cābhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭā, sāpi yogyā / tata ubhayorapi yogyagrahaṇena saṃgrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:156_0: sāmānyadi tena vinītadevavyākhyā dūṣitā- abhilapyata ityabhilāpaḥ= vācyaḥ sāmānyādiḥ ityevaṃrūpā /
SA15dhnyabpu:156_1: evamevātrāśrayaṇīyam, anyathā yogyagrahaṇena śabdasaṃsargayogyo na kathitaḥ syāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:156_2: yadayevam, dharmottaravyākhyāne jātyādervācakasya saṃsargabhāvo na pradarśitaḥ syāt? satyamanena na pratipāditaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:156_3: viṣayacintāyāṃ sāmānyādeviṣayabhāvakathanena sāmarthyāt kathitaṃ bhavatīti nirodhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:156_5: nanu ca yadayapi tasmin jñāne ākārayormīlanaṃ tathapi śabdārthayoḥ saṃsargo nāsti? ityāha- tato yadaikasminnityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:157_0: tatra kācit pratītirityādinā yogyagrahaṇasya viṣayaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:157_2: nanu cāvyutpannasaṃketasya bālamūkāderanumato vijñāne na śabdasaṃsarga iti tadayogyatvamapi nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:157_4: mūkādijñāne tu saṃketābhāve sati śabdaratibhāso 'pi na sambhavatīti sasargayogyatvamapi nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:160_0: yadvā- na abhilapyate iti abhilāpaḥ= abhidherya yadarthasāmānyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:160_5: jñāne 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyo yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ sa evābhilāpa asatyabhilāpasaṃsarge kuto yogyatāvasitiḥ? iti cetḥ aniyatapratibhāsatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:160_7: grahyo hyartho vijñānaṃ janayan niyatapratibhāsaṃ kuryāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:161_1: bālo 'pi hi yāvad dṛśyamānaṃ stanaṃ sa evāyam iti pūrvaduṣṭatvena na pratyavamṛśati tāvannoparatarudito mukhamarpayati stane /
SA15dhnyabpu:162_0: tataśca vyāavarttyābhavāda yogyagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkāṃ parasya darśayati asatyabhilāpetyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:162_6: nanu kalpanājñānamapyarthādutpadayamānaṃ niyatākāarṃ bhaviṣyati? ityāha- vikalpavijñānamityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:162_10: tathā niyatapratibhāsaṃ vikalpajñānaṃ bālamūkāderapyastīti darśayati- bālo 'pi hītyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:162_11: nanu ca bālasya tālvādikaraṇapāṭavābhāve sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdoccāraṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:162_12: tat kimucyate- sa evāyamiti? satyaṃ nāstiḥ kintu sa evāyam ityenena vikalpasyāvasthocyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:162_15: etad darśayati- bālasyāpi pūrvaparaparāmarśarūpaṃ vikalpakaṃ vijñānamasti,
SA15dhnyabpu:162_16: niyataviṣaye pravṛtteḥ, yathā gṛhītasaṃketasya pūrvāparaparāmaśena pravṛtiriti /
SA15dhnyabpu:163_0: evaṃ śleṣeṇa vākyasya vyākhyānena ubhayorapi tadvikalpākāraḥ abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsa ityuktaṃ veditavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:165_1: yadayapi hi svalakṣaṇameva vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:165_3: na cendriyavijñānam arthena niyamitapratibhāsatvāt abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ bhavatīti nirvikalpakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:166_1: śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kiñcit vācyaṃ kiñcid vācakam- ityabhilākasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:167_0: ropitatvāditi saṃsagaṃyogyaṃ bālamūkādervijñānamiti tannivṛttyarthaṃ yogyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:168_0: indriyavijñānamityādinā kumarilena yadindriyavijñānasyālocanākhyasya bālamūkādivijñānena sādṛśyaṃ pratipāditam,
SA15dhnyabpu:168_1: tad dūṣayitumukasṃhāravyājena vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati ata evetvādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:168_3: ata eva svalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdasyārthasya ca vācya vācakatvamamyupagamya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya sādhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:168_4: vikalpavijñānasya tu svalakṣaṇavācya vācakatvaṃ pratibhāsino 'pi savikalpakatvamiti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:168_8: kutaḥ? sāmānyayorviṣayacintāyāmeva nirasyamānatvāditi nirvikalpakatvakathanaṃ vyartha syādiha /
SA15dhnyabpu:168_10: tena yad vinītadevena sāmānyayorvācyavācakabhāvamaṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpakatvamindriyāvijñānasya pratipāditam,
SA15dhnyabpu:169_3: yadā ghaṭaśabdaḥ / śabdaśabdo vā śabdaṃ śabdena pratipadayate,
SA15dhnyabpu:169_4: tadā kiñcid vācyaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ kiñcid vācakaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇa
SA15dhnyabpu:172_2: tena etaduktyā śabdārthasāmānyākārarahitāyā pratītiḥ sā eva pratītiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:173_2: nauyānamiti nāvā yānam / saṃkṣoma naiṣa doṣaḥ, satyapi svalakṣaṇasya vācyavācakabhāve saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:173_3: na ca saṃketakālabhāvi darśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastunaḥ saṃpratyamti /
SA15dhnyabpu:175_0: tayeti / tayā kalpanayā kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitaṃ śūnyaṃ sahjñānaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti pareṇa sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:175_2: tataḥ śuddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabdavijñāne dvayorapi śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanāccotrendriyajñānamaniyatapratibhāsitvāt savikalpakaṃ syādityākūtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:176_1: tathāpi śrotravijñāne na vācyavācakatayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:176_6: tāvat kuto vācyatvaṃ vācakatvaṃ vā syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:176_7: etatpratyabhijñayā sa evāyaṃ vācako bhaviṣyatotyāha na ca saṃketakāletyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:176_9: kaśca saṃketaviṣayaḥ śabdaḥ? yaḥ saṃketakālabhāvinā jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:176_10: yaśca pūrva jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sa idānī nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:177_0: yogijñānena yadyekasmin kāle manovijñānena ca yugapaccabdāthau gṛhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:177_1: tathāpi sannihitavastutayā tena gṛhītavyāviti darśayati- yogijñānamityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:178_1: tataśca tasyāpi nirvikalpakatvaṃ prāpnoti? ityāśaṅkayāha- tathā kalpanayā kalpanāsvabhāvenetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:178_3: timiraṃ ca āśubhramaṇaṃ ca nauyānaṃ ca saṃkṣobhaśceti te ādayo yeṣāṃ te timirāśubhramaṇanauyānasaṃkṣobhādayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:179_0: pratyakṣalakṣaṇam, na pratyekam- iti darśayituṃ tayā rahitaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti lakṣaṇayoḥ parasparasāpekṣayoḥ pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ darśitamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:180_1: āśubhramaṇam alātādeḥ / mandaṃ hi bhramyamāṇe 'lātādau n acakrabhrāntirutpadyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:180_4: nāvā gamanaṃ nauyānam / gaccantyāṃ nāvi sthitasya gaccadvṛkṣādibhrāntirutpadyate iti yaunagrahaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:181_0: sarvareva ca vibhramakāraṇairindriyaviṣayabāhyādhyātmikāśrayagatairindriya- manyate-dharmiṇā kalpanājñānena dharmo 'tra kalpanātvaṃ lakṣyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:181_1: yathā viṣāṇītyava viṣāṇitvamḥ tataśca kalpanātvena rahitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tannirvikalpakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:182_1: na svātantryeṇa pṛthaglakṣaṇatvamiti darśayitumante pratyakṣaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā tayorapi sambadhnāti-tatpratyakṣamiti pareṇa sambandha ityanena /
SA15dhnyabpu:182_4: āśubhramaṇamiti / mandaṃ bhramyamāṇaḥ iti viśeṣaṇasya vyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:182_6: nauyānamiti / samudāyapraśnaḥ / gaccatyāṃ nāvītyādinā / prayojanaṃ darśayati bāhyāśrayasthitamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:182_7: bāhyā nauḥ saivāśrayastatra sthitasyāśrayadvārako vibhrama uccate /
SA15dhnyabpu:183_0: nanu cendriyagatameva vibhramakāraṇam pratyucyateḥ nānyairindriyagatairindriyaṃ bikriyāṃ gatam? ityāha- sarvairevetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:185_0: jñānaṃ prayakṣamiti / sūtre jñānaṃ noktam / kathaṃ tallamyate iti ced? kalpanā jñānenaiva pratibaddhā,
SA15dhnyabpu:185_3: yathā avatsā gaurānīyatām ityanena kācit aśvā nānīyate ghenurevā noyate tasyā eva vatsambandhadarśanāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:186_1: 2 mānasam, 3 ātmasaṃvedanam, 4 yogijñānaṃ ceti caturvidhaṃ jñeyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:186_2: pravibhāgo 'yaṃ viprati- meva vikartavyam avikṛte indriye indriyabhrāntyayogāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:186_3: ete sṃkṣobhaparyantā ādayo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:187_0: tairanāhito vibhrabho yasmistat tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam // 6 //
SA15dhnyabpu:188_2: viniścaro tu saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvādiśabdena bahubrīhisamāsaṃ darśayataḥ ko 'bhirpāyaṣṭhīkākṛta iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:188_3: vyutpattibhedakathanameva, nārthabheda iti / yadā saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsastadāśrayagatasya vibhramakāraṇasya upalakṣaṇatvād vātapittādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti nārthabhedaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:188_5: timirādītyeva kriyatām, ādigrahaṇena sarveṣāṃ saṃgraho bhaviṣyati? ucyateḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:188_8: teṣāmupādāne, yadyādigrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta, tadā teṣāṃ svarūpagrahaṇameva syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:188_10: tata ubhayopādāne sati timirādīmybhayakātsnrya labhyata iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:188_11: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānamiti yadayapi sūtre jñānagrahaṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:188_12: tathāpi bhrānte jñānadharmatvād tadvayudāsena jñānameva pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata ityadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:188_13: vinītadevavyākhyāyāṃ bhavati tu pratykṣasūtresyārthakathanaṃ jñānaṃ pratykṣamiti,
SA15dhnyabpu:189_1: vaibhāṣikaiḥ- cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi iti atiriṣyate/
SA15dhnyabpu:189_2: mānase ca pratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvita iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:189_3: dvābhyāṃ, bhikṣavo, rūpaṃ dṛśyate cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena manovijñānena iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:191_1: tannirāsārtha prathamam / indriyajanyaṃ jñānṃ hi pratyakṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:191_2: na tvindriyamiti / kaiścit mānasapratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvitaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:192_1: manastu indriyaṃ naḥ mānasapratyakṣasya pṛthaṅ nirdeśāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:192_2: tasmāt cakṣurādīndriyeṣu āśritaṃ jñānameva indriyajanya pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:193_0: lakṣaṇe ca doṣa udbhāvitaḥ, svasaṃvedanaṃ ca nābhyupagatam,
SA15dhnyabpu:193_1: yogijñānaṃ ca, teṣāṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtha pratyakṣasya prakārabhedaṃ darśayannāha- taccaturvidhamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:195_2: tanmanojñānaṃ yadīndriyavijñānaviṣaye pravatate tadā gṛhītagrāhitayā pramāṇam athānyaviṣaya pravartate,
SA15dhnyabpu:195_3: vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ bhavat ki tanmanovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ syāt? nirapekṣa vā? indriyasavyapekṣatve satīndriyavijñānameva,
SA15dhnyabpu:195_4: nirapekṣatve vānindrisyāpi manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādityandhavadhirādyabhāvacodayaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:196_5: mīmāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ- yogina eva na santi samprati pramāṇābhāvāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:197_2: indriyāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam iti bruvatā vārttikakṛtā na cakṣuḥ pramāṇam iti kathitaṃ bhavati yasmājjñānasyaivānvayavyatirekānuvidhānād rūpādidarśane sāmarthyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:197_3: na cakṣuṣaḥ / yattūktam- jñānaṃ cet paśyati,
SA15dhnyabpu:197_4: vyavahitamapi ki na paśyati? amūrtasyāvācakābhāvāt iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:199_6: sa sahakāriī yasya indriyajñānasya taqt svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāri indriyajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:199_7: samanantarapratyayabhūtena indriyajñānena janitaṃ yat tadeva manomātrāśrayatvānmānasaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:200_2: sva ātmīyo viṣaya indriyajñānasya tasya anantaraḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:200_5: tataścāntare pratiṣiddhe samānajātīyo dvitīyakṣaṇabhavyupadeyakṣaṇa indriyavijñānaviṣayasya gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:201_1: ekakāryakārī ca / iha ca kṣaṇike vastuni atiśayādhānāyogādekakāyakāritvena sahakārī gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:202_2: tasyanantara ityasya vivaraṇam- na vidayata ityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:203_3: api tu ekakāryakāritvāditi / tadeva darśayati- viṣayetyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:203_8: smantara iti ca bhavati śakan'vādiṣu pāṭhāt ṣararūpatvam,
SA15dhnyabpu:203_9: yataḥ sa ceti iha svaviṣayānantaraviṣaya it kathanaṃ gṛhītagrahaṇādavabodhakaṃ na bhavatīti doṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:205_0: tadanenaikasantānāntarbhūtayoreva indriyajñāna manovijñānayojanyajanakabhāve manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti uktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:207_0_0: samanantaraḥ / hetutvāditi / pratyayārthakathanametat / tena janitamityādinetat kathayati- indriyavijñānena svaviṣayāntaraviṣayasahakāriṇopādānabhūtena
SA15dhnyabpu:208_0: yadā cetyādinā dvayorekaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhītvā yaccoditaṃ pareṇa tat parihṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:208_1: pūrvakṣaṇe indriyavijñānasya viṣayo dvitīyakṣaṇe manovijñānasya viṣaya ityagṛhītagrāhi manovijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:209_0: yadā cityādinā yaccodayaṃ kṛtam- yadi manovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:209_3: tat parihṛtam / yasmādindriyavijñānaviṣayasya dvitīyopādeyabhūtaviṣayakṣaṇo gṛhīto manovijñānaviṣayaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:209_6: tena teṣāṃ na manovijñānaṃ bhavatīti parihṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:210_2: śabdasyocceditvāt / aparasya śabdasya śabdādanutpatterityavaśyaṃ mānasaṃ pratyakṣaśabdaviṣayameṣṭavyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:210_3: anyathā pañca bāhyā vijñeyāḥ ityasya vyaghātaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:210_5: nopādeyakṣaṇa evaḥ tena vijñānaviṣayadeśe 'paraśbdo yadotpadyate tadā mānasaṃ pratykṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā janitaṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:211_1: kutaḥ? indriyavijñānena samanantarapratyayena janitamityukterandhavadhirādayabhavayadā cidnriyavijñānaviṣayopādeyabhūtaḥ kṣaṇo gṛhītaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:212_1: cyapāravati tu cakṣuṣi yad rūpajñānaṃ tat sarva cakṣuraśritamevaḥ itarathā cakṣurāśritatvānu papattiḥ kasyacidapi vijñānasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:213_2: evañjātīyakaṃ tad yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syād- iti vaktuṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātamasyeti /
SA15dhnyabpu:214_1_0: uparute cakṣuṣauti / yadā cakṣuviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ sat punadvitīye kṣaṇa
SA15dhnyabpu:214_2: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā pratyakṣamutpadayate iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:214_3: nanvekasmin kṣaṇe tasyotpadake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyate- iti puruṣārthānupayogitvāt prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti? ucyateḥ na mānasapratyakṣeṇāsmadvighānāmarthakriyāvāptirbhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:214_4: api tu yogino vītarāgādeḥ / te ca tasmin kṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadaya dharmadeśanādikamarthakriyāmāsādayantītyanavadayam /
SA15dhnyabpu:215_0: atha vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimiti mānasotpattilupyate? ityāha- vyāpāravatītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:215_3: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:215_6: evaṃ manyate- vyāāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadayate,
SA15dhnyabpu:215_9: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣamindriyavijñānād bhitre pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:215_10: tadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāsti? ityaha- etacce tyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:215_11: evañjātīyakamiti / indriyavijñānasadṛśam / tadetad dharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatāmācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yat pramāṇamupanyastam vikalpodayāt iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:216_0: terevaṃ vyakhyātam- vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi indriyajñānamtpadayate, mānasaṃ ca, na śakyate
SA15dhnyabpu:218_0: prasaṅgadoṣo nirastaḥ / andhavadhirayomanovijñāne samanantarapratyaya indriyavijñānaṃ nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:219_4: sarve ca te cittcaittāśca sarvacitta vaktum- dvayoyugapadutpattirnāstītiḥ yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:219_5: na bhinnendriyayoḥ, ṣaṇṇā yugapadutpattiḥ iti vacanāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:219_7: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasa nāstīti śakyate vaktumḥ samānajātīyanīlavikalpīdayāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:219_8: yadi ca tanna mānasaṃ syāt, tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī nīlavikalpo na syādeva /
SA15dhnyabpu:219_11: yathā- devadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:220_4: anupalabhyamānatvāt tayoḥ / tenendriyavijñānādeva vijātīyād vikalpakasyotpattenaṃ dikalpasyodayāditi mānasasiddhau hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:223_1: na mānasam / tataśca tatsāmarthyabhavi kathaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ smaraṇam? vijātīyatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:223_2: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyate indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa,
SA15dhnyabpu:223_3: prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt kiñca indriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmānyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:223_4: yadi svavyāpāraṃ karoti? svavyāpārastu svaviṣaye vikalpajanakatvaṃ nāma,
SA15dhnyabpu:224_0: nanu cittacaitā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ tadgrahaṇam? sarvetyuktyā bhramajñānānyapi parigṛhyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:225_0: sarve hi cittacaittāḥ pratītisvabhāvatvāt svarūpajñāpakā bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:225_1: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvabhāvatvād ātmano 'pi prakāśako bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:225_5: nāsti sā kācit cittāvasthā, yasyāmātmanaḥ saṃvedanaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:226_0: yena hi rūpeṇātmā vedayate tadrūpamātmasavedanaṃ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:227_0: iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādayākārastulyakālaṃ saṃvedayate /
SA15dhnyabpu:227_1: na ca gṛhayamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedayate- iti vaktuṃ śakyamḥ yato nīlādiḥ sātarūpeṇānubhūyate iti ca niścīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:228_0: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yaṃ nīlādiranubhūyate iti niścīyeta,
SA15dhnyabpu:228_2: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpenānugamyate tat pratykṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:229_0: ityāha- sukhādaya evetyādi / na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhaḥ dayaścittarcattāḥ svasaṃvedanā gṛhyanteḥ anye 'pi svasaṃvedanā iti tātparyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:229_3: evaṃ brubatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:229_4: tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kācit cittāvasthā saṃvedayate yataḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:230_4: evaṃ manyate- yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāntamapekṣate,
SA15dhnyabpu:230_5: tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayadātmasaṃvedane na jñānāntaramapekṣate /
SA15dhnyabpu:230_9: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva /
SA15dhnyabpu:230_12: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodharūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnuyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:230_13: evaṃ tāvat mausāṃsakādīn prati vijñānaṃ saṃvedanapratyakṣanirdiṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:231_0: yastu sāṃkhyo 'pi bāhyārūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti manyate, taṃ pratyāha- iha ca
SA15dhnyabpu:233_0: tathā cittacaitā api svarūpāvabodhe jñānāntaraṃ nāpekṣante /
SA15dhnyabpu:234_2: yathā catvāri āryasatyāni / tasya bhāvanā bhūtārthabhāvanā /
SA15dhnyabpu:234_3: bhāvanā iti na ca nīlasya sātarūpatvamanugamyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:234_5: tacca jñānameva / tato 'sti jñānānubhavaḥ / tacca jñānarūpadevadanamātmanaḥ sākṣātkāri nirvikalpakam,
SA15dhnyabpu:237_0: rūpādau dṛśyamāna ityādi / evaṃ manyate- nīlarūpāt sātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhayenābhinnarūpaṃ jaḍarūpaṃ ca śakyate vktumiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:238_0: amumvārtha na ca gṛhyamāṇākāra ityādinā darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:239_0: sākṣātkāritvavyāpāra iti / pratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ / vikalpaḥ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī /
SA15dhnyabpu:240_2: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ iti sāṅkhayaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyāgrāhakaṃ sātādirūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:240_3: tena yuktamuktaṃ kaiścit- grāhayād bhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:242_2: tataśca kṣaṇikatvādigrāhi manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānamīṣadasampūrṇamantakṣaṇaḥ prakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:242_3: tadeva darśayati abhyāsaḥ / tasyāh prakarṣo bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:243_0: tathā hi samādhivalaprabhavaṃ bhūta-bhāvi-vartamānānāṃ yathāyartha prakāśakaṃ jyotiḥ avibhramamāvirbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:243_1: yathā devādyaṣṭhānaprabhāveṇa satyāni svapnajñānāni bhūta-bhāvi- sampūrṇa tu yadā,
SA15dhnyabpu:243_2: tadā nāsti prakarṣagatiḥ / tataḥ sampūrṇāvasthāyāḥ prāktanī avasthā sphuṭābhatvaprakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:243_3: tasmāt paryantāt yajjātaṃ bhāvyamānasyāthasya sannihitasyeva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:244_1: abhrakavyavahitamiva yadā bhāvyāmānaṃ vastu paśyati sā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā /
SA15dhnyabpu:244_2: karatalāmalakavat bhāvyamānasyārthasya yad darśana tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:245_0: yadā sphuṭābhatvamityādinā / tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhetyādinā upasaṃhāracyajena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati- bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthaikā,
SA15dhnyabpu:247_0: iti nyāyād yadayapi manovijñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantena śabdārtho yugapada gṛhyate tathāpi dvayoḥ svarūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāt tadgrāhi vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:248_0: nanu ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā,
SA15dhnyabpu:248_1: tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantarja manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratirbhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:248_4: eva manyate- aydyapi manovijñānaṃ vācya vācakasaṃsṛṣṭipratibhāsi,
SA15dhnyabpu:248_6: vittirūpaṃ tu tasya nijam / atastadeva cidrūpaṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:248_9: sphuṭābhatvādityasya / yadā tu vikalpavijñānaṃ śabdasaṃsargayogyavastu gṛhṇati,
SA15dhnyabpu:248_12: tathaiva yogabalena dhyeyānāṃ jñānamatītānāgata dūra sāntara aṇubhūtaviṣayāṇā prakāśakaṃ jyotīrūpamutpadyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:249_0: atra prayogaḥ- yogīśvarāṇāmekāgracittānāṃ jñānaṃ bhūta bhāvi vastuviṣayakaṃ pramāṇam ameyabhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetutvād,
SA15dhnyabpu:249_3: yathāunmattajñānam / aprāpakasyāpi ameya bhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetave 'yogyamapakārakamapi pramāṇaṃ ṣyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:249_4: dambhamātreṇāmeyasya padārthasya abhrāntopadarśanaṃ hi na sambhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:250_0: tasya vyākhyānam- yathā grahaviśeṣāveśe bhūta bhāvivastusamūhānuśāsanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:250_3: yathā vā bhagavata śākyamunerupadeśe bhāvideśanimitta satyopalabdhi mātṛceṭa kālakṣaya rājāśokādi āśāvana kaśmīrādeśāgamā aviparītā upalabhyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:251_1: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇat śabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:251_3: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ samprati asat,

SA15dhnyabpu:257_1: pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yaduktam- tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇameva iti draṣṭavyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:258_0: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasya prakārabhedaṃ pratipādaya viṣayavipratipatti nirākatukāma āha- tasyetyādi /

SA15dhnyabpu:264_1: tattvamiti / arthakriyākāri / anena lakṣaṇaśabdo vivṛtaḥ / lakṣyate dāhādyarthakriyā yena tatlakṣaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:264_2: etad darśayati asādharaṇameva tattvaṃ vastuno rūpam /

SA15dhnyabpu:264_5: sāmānyaṃ ca / tatrā sādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhaviṣaya iti darśayati- yadasādhāraṇamityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:264_7: yāvatā kimanyo viṣayo 'sti pratyakṣasya? astītyāha- dvividha ityādi /

SA15dhnyabpu:266_0: svalakṣaṇaṃ ca kīdṛśamavagantavyamiti cet? tatrāha- yasyeti /

SA15dhnyabpu:272_0: yo hītyādinetad darśayati / arthakriyāsamarthasyaiva sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsabhedaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:272_1: na sāmānyasyeti / na sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇam āropitarūpasya dūrāsannābhyāṃ sarvadavādphuṭatvāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:272_2: nanu sāmānyameva dūre gṛhyamāṇamasphuṭapratibhāsaṃ na svalakṣaṇam? ityāha- sarvāṇyevetyāhi /
SA15dhnyabpu:273_0: nanu yadi dūrāsannābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ rūpadvayaṃ tasya syāt,

SA15dhnyabpu:276_1: kasmāt svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya iti cet? tatrāha- tadeveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:277_1: parama iti akṛtrimaḥ / āropaśūnya iti śeṣaḥ / paramārthaḥ saditi paramārthasat /
SA15dhnyabpu:278_0: yo hi jñānaviṣayaḥ sannihitaḥ san sphuṭābhāsaṃ jñānasya karoti,
SA15dhnyabpu:278_2: tat svalakṣaṇam / sarvāṇyeva hi vastūni dūrāsphuṭāni dṛśyante,
SA15dhnyabpu:279_1: tathāhi vikalpaviṣayo 'pi vahnirdṛśyātmaka evāvasīyate? ityāha- tadeva paramārthasaditi /

SA15dhnyabpu:280_1: yadā dūre nīlaṃ paśyati tadālokaparamāṇūnāṃ ca rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtatvāt spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñāna bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:280_2: nikaṭe tu ālokaparamāṇūnāṃ bahutvānna te rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtā iti spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:280_4: na paramārthata iti / sāmānyasya tu jñānadvāreṇa na spaṣṭāspaṣṭarūpe,

SA15dhnyabpu:281_9: tathāpi sa eva svalakṣaṇam, dāhādyarthakriyārūpeṇa vyavasāyādityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:282_0: tadeva paramārthasaditi / evaṃ manyate- na hyāropabalādavastu vastu bhavati,

SA15dhnyabpu:286_0: arthaḥ= prayojanam / kriyā= niṣpattiḥ / arthasya kriyā arthakriyā / prayojana niṣpattiriti śeṣaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:288_2: heyo hi hātumiṣyate, upādeyaścopādātum / arthasya pratyojanasya, kriyā niṣpattiḥ, tasyāṃ sāmarthya śaktiḥ, tadeva lakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ yasya vastunaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:289_4: tata eva hi pratyakṣaviṣayādartha kriyā prāpyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:289_5: na vikalpaviṣayāt / ata eva yadayapi vikalpaviṣayo dṛśya ivāvasīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:289_6: tathāpi na sa dṛśya eva tato 'rtahkriyāyā abhāvāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:290_0: anyadityādi / etasmāt svalakṣaṇāt yadanyat-svalakṣaṇaṃ yo na sarvasya śaśaviṣāṇādervastutvaprasaṅgāt /

SA15dhnyabpu:306_0: ayaṃ cāsya sambandhaḥ- yadi pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvamiṣṭaṃ tarhi rūpādiprameyaparīkṣaṇalakṣaṇena pramāṇaphalena bhavitavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:306_1: yathā kuṭhārikayā vṛkṣādicedane dvikhaṇḍīkaraṇaṃ phalaṃ dṛśyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:307_1: yadevānantaramuktaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva pramāṇasya phalam /

SA15dhnyabpu:309_2: tathā hi- pramāṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ pramitikriyāṃ vinā na bhavati,

SA15dhnyabpu:309_5: na hi paraśureva cittiriti / ato mīmāṃsakena indriyaṃ pramāṇamindriyārthasannikarṣaḥ,

SA15dhnyabpu:310_1: manaso vindriyairyoga ātmanā sarva eva vā //

SA15dhnyabpu:316_1: prāpaṇaśaktiśca na kevalā darthāvinābhāvitvād bhavatiḥ bījādayavinābhāvino 'pyaṃkurādraprāpakatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:317_0: tasmāt prāpyādarthād utpattāvapyasya jñānasyāsti kaścidavaśyakartavyaḥ prāpakavyāpāro yena kṛtenārthaḥ prāpito bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:318_0: sa eva ca pramāṇaphalam yadanuṣṭhānāt prāpakaṃ bhavati jñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:318_1: uktaṃ ca purastāt- pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanameva prāpakasya vyāpāro nāma /
SA15dhnyabpu:319_0: jñānaṃ pramāṇam, viśeṣyajñānaṃ phalamiti / yathoktaṃ kumārilena-
SA15dhnyabpu:322_2: evaṃ manyate- yena phalena niṣpannenānantareṇa pramāṇasya karaṇatvavyapadeśo bhavati tadeva phalam,
SA15dhnyabpu:322_3: nānyat / arthapariccedakatvena vijñāna utpanne svaviṣayaniścayajanakatve sati samāpto jñānasya parmāṇavyāpāra iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:322_4: arthapariccittireva phalam, na pravartakādikam / amumevārtha darśayati- etaduktamityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:323_0: pramāṇādarśapariccittirūpasya phalasya bhinnatvaṃ darśayituṃ pramāṇajñānasya svarūpaṃ prāgdaśitamapi punarapi darśayati- prāpakaṃ jñānamityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:323_1: evaṃ manyate- yasmāt prāpakaṃ vijñānaṃ pramāṇamiṣṭamasmābhiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:323_6: na ca bījādikaṃ prāpayati, khalabilāntargatasyāpi bījsyāṃkurotpādaktvādityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:326_3: tasmāt pratyakṣasyārthaniścayasvabhavatvāt pratyakṣameva phalasvabhāvaṃ syāditi veditavyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:327_1: tarhi pramāṇaṃ nāma kiṃ veditavyam? ityāśaṅkāyāmāha- arthetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:328_0: sārūpyam= sādṛśyam / asyeti pratyakṣasya / arthākāraṃ yat pratyakṣaṃ tadeva pramāṇamiti śeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:330_0: tadeva ca pratyakṣam arthapratītirūpam arthapradarśanarūpam / ataratadeva pramāṇaphalam // 19 //
SA15dhnyabpu:331_2: arthena saha yat sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyam asya jñānasya tat pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:331_3: iha yasmād viṣayāt viṣayāt vijñānamudeti tadviṣayasadṛśaṃ tad bhavati yathā- nīlādutpadayamānaṃ nīlasadṛśam /
SA15dhnyabpu:332_1: tathā ca sati tadeva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ sa eveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:332_6: arthapradarśakaṃ ca tadeveti purastāt saṃvarṇitaṃ pramāṇasvarūpacintāyām /
SA15dhnyabpu:332_8: tasya ca prāpaṇaśaktirarthapariccittireva tāvatā parisamāptatvāt pramāṇavyāpārasyeti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:333_1: jñānāt tarhi pramāṇena bhinnena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ pṛccati- yadi tarhītyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:333_5: naindriyādikamiti / viṣayādutpadyamānaṃ viṣayasadṛśaṃ bhavatīti tadeva sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamuktamiti darśayati- iha yasmādityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:334_0: nanu cetyādi / evaṃ manyate paraḥ- indriyādikaṃ pramāṇamuktamasmābhiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:334_3: evaṃ hi nīlasya pratītiriyam na pātasya iti vyavasthāpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:334_4: tatra ca yo hetuḥ sa eva pramāṇatveneṣṭhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:335_1: tathā hi taccendriyaṃ sarvasyaiva jñānasya sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamiti pratyekaniścayavyavasthitau kathaṃ samartha syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:335_3: na caikaṃ vastu sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ copapadyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:335_4: tat kathaṃ sārūpyaṃ pramāṇam? ityāha- tadvaśāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:335_5: taditi sārūpyam, tasya vasāt sārūpya samarthyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:335_6: arthasya pratītiḥ avabodhaḥ, tasyāḥ siddhiḥ / tatsiddheḥ kāraṇāt / arthasya pratītirūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vijñānaṃ sārūpyavaśāt sidhyati,
SA15dhnyabpu:335_7: pratītaṃ bhavatī tyarthaḥ / nīlānirbhāsaṃ hi vijñānaṃ yataḥ tasmāt nīlasya pratītiravasīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:335_9: na tadvaśāt tajjñānaṃ naulasya saṃvedanaṃ śakyate 'vasthāpayitum /
SA15dhnyabpu:336_5: kiñci- arthasārūpye pramāṇe 'ṅgī kriyamāṇe pramāṇaphalayoraikyānnaikaṃ karma karaṇaṃ bhavatīti yaccoditaṃ tat tadavasthameveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:336_6: tadvaśādityādi / evaṃ manyate- pramāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ ca sādhakatamaṃ kārakāṇām /
SA15dhnyabpu:336_10: nīlanirbhāsaṃ hītyādinā / nīlākāraṃ nīlavijñānasya nīlāvagamavyavasthāyā nimittaṃ darśayati /

SA15dhnyabpu:338_1: pītādijñānaṃ ca na janayet tadaiva vyavasthāya samartha syāt /

SA15dhnyabpu:342_1: na tu nirvikalpakatvāt pratyaksameva nīlavodharūpatvenātmānamavasthapayituṃ śaknoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:342_3: tasmānniścayena nīlabodharūpaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ vijñānaṃ nīlabodhātmanā sad bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:343_2: tathā ca pramāṇaphalamarthā na tvartha utpādyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:343_3: tathāhi- nīlākāre vijñāna utpanna viśiṣṭajñānaṃ vyavasthāpayati,
SA15dhnyabpu:344_0_0: nanu ca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ viśiṣṭākāramutpannaṃ kathaṃ tasya samānakāla evāṃśāṃśitayā vyavasthāpya vyavasthāpakabhāvo bhavatīti
SA15dhnyabpu:344_1: sadṛśamiti / evaṃ manyate- na vijñānameva nirvikalpakamātmānaṃ vyavasthāpayati,
SA15dhnyabpu:344_3: tatra cārthākārasya vyavasthāpanahetutvamasārūpyavyāvṛttibhedenārthabodhatayā vyavasthāpyasyotpādena vedanasya tu vyavasthāpyatvam niścayapratyayatu vyavasthāpaka iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:344_5: nanu nīlajñānamtpanna svasaṃvedanapratyakṣasiddhaṃ yadi niścayavaśāt pramāṇavyavasthā labhyate,

SA15dhnyabpu:344_7: yāvatā niścayapratyayaṃ vināpipramāṇaṃ bhavatyeva? ityāha- niścayapratyasenāvyavasthāpitamityādi sārūpyaṃ tu asādhāraṇatvāt pratyekaniścayavyavasthitiheturbhavati /

SA15dhnyabpu:348_1: na kevalam- iti cet? naitadevam yasmāt pratyakṣabalotpannenādhyasāyena dṛśyatvenārtho 'vasīyate,

SA15dhnyabpu:355_5: kathaṃ tāvat pūrvaṃ na lakṣaṇamabhidīyeta? vibhāgena ca pratiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sukhena vaktu śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:356_0: svārthamiti / svārtha parārtah ceti viśeṣeṇa dvaividhyamevopadarśyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:356_1: atra artha iti prayohanam / svaprayojanaṃ paraprayojanaṃ ceti śeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:357_0: evaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyākhyāya, anumānaṃ vyākhyātukāma āha- anu mānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:357_2: athānumānalakṣaṇe vaktavye kimakasmāt prakārabheda kathyate? ucyate parārthānumānaṃ śabdātmakam,
SA15dhnyabpu:357_7: vyaktibhede ca kathite prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śakyate vaktum nānyathā /
SA15dhnyabpu:357_9: aśakyatāṃ ca prakārabhedakathanamantareṇa lakṣaṇanirdeśasya jñātvā prāk prakārabhedaḥ kathyate iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:358_1: svasmāyidaṃ svartham / yena svayaṃ pratipadayate tat svārtham /
SA15dhnyabpu:358_2: parasmāyidaṃ paramārtham / yena paraṃ pratipādayati tat parārtham /
SA15dhnyabpu:359_0: tatreti / tatra tayoḥ svārtha- parārthānumānayormadhye svārtha jñānaṃ kiṃviṣṭam? ityāha- trirūpāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:359_1: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasya vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni tat trirūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:361_1: sapakṣe eva sattvam, asapakṣe cāsattvameva niścitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:362_2: anumīyate iti anumeyaḥ / trilakṣaṇād hetoranumeye yajjñānamutpadayate tadeva dvārthānumānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:362_3: liṅgābhāsād yajjñānamutpadayate tadapyanumānaṃ syāditi tannirāsārthamanumeya ityuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:362_4: jñānamiti kathanaṃ tu liṅgameva vastuto 'numānaṃ syāditi tannirāsārtham /
SA15dhnyabpu:363_1: tarhi phalaṃ nāma kiṃ syāt? ityāśaṅkāyāmāha- pramāṇetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:365_0: trirūpālliṅgāt, ityuktam / kāni ca tāni trīṇi rūpāṇi?- ityāśaṅkāyāmāha- trairūpyamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:366_0: yat jātaṃ jñānamiti / etad hetudvāreṇa viśeṣaṇam / tat trirūpācca liṅgāt trirūpaliṅgālambanamapyutpadayata iti viśinaṣṭi- anumeya it /
SA15dhnyabpu:368_1: pramāṇāsya yat phalaṃ tasya yā vyavasthā sā atra anumāne 'pi pratyakṣa iva pratyakṣavat veditavyā /
SA15dhnyabpu:370_4: 1 anumeye sattvameveti / adhonirdiṣṭhānumeyalakṣaṇe sattvameva prathamaṃ rūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:371_0: 2 sapakṣe eva sattvamiti / samajātīye sattvameva dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:372_0: 3 asapakṣe cāsattvameveti / asamajātīye kvacidapi asattvaṃ tṛtīyaṃ rūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:373_1: liṅgasya yat trairūpyaṃ yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi /
SA15dhnyabpu:374_4: yato na yogyatayā liṅgaṃ parokṣajñānasya nimittam;
SA15dhnyabpu:374_8: tasmāt parokṣārthanāntarīya katayā niściyanameva liṅgasya parokṣārthapratipādanavyāpāraḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:374_9: nāparaḥ kaścit / ato 'nvayavyatirekapakṣadharmatvaniścayo liṅgavyāpārātmakatvādavaśyakartavya iti sarveṣu rūpeṣu niścitagrahaṇamapekṣaṇiyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:375_2: yathā citanāstaravaḥ, svāpāda iti pakṣīkṛteṣu taruṣu patrasaṅkocalakṣaṇaḥ svāpa ekadeśe na siddhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:375_4: kintu kecideva / sattvavacanasya paścātkṛtenaiva kāraṇenāsādhāraṇo dharmo nirastaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:375_5: yadi hi anumeya eva sattvam iti kuryāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:375_6: śrāvaṇatvameva hetuḥ syāt / niścitagrahaṇena sandigdhāsiddhaḥ sarvo nirastaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:376_0: 2 sapakṣo vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaḥ, tasminneva sattvaṃ niścitamiti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:376_2: sa hi nāsti sapakṣe / evakāreṇa sādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:376_3: sa hi na sapakṣa eva vartate,
SA15dhnyabpu:378_1: tāni ca trīṇi rūpāṇi svayaṃ yathāyathaṃ pramāṇairniścatānyeva grāhayāṇī anyathānumeye pratyāyanamaśakyameveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:380_0: trāpi / sattvagrahaṇāt pūrvāvadhāraṇavacanena sapakṣāvyāpisattākasyāpi prayatnāntarauyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:380_1: paścādavadhāraṇe tvayamarthaḥ syāt sapakṣe sattvameva yasya sa heturiti prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:380_3: yathā- sarvajñaḥ kaścit, vaktṛtvāt / vaktṛtvaṃ hi sapakṣe sarvajñe sandigdham /
SA15dhnyabpu:382_0: prayatnāntarīyakatve sādhye hyanityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśe vidyudādau asti,
SA15dhnyabpu:382_1: ākāśādau nāsti / tato niyamenāsya nirāsaḥ / asattvaśabdāddhi pūrvasminnavadhāraṇe 'yamarthaḥ syāt-vipakṣa eva yo nāsti sa hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:382_2: tathā ca prayatnānantaroyakatvaṃ sapakṣe 'pi sarvatra nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:382_3: tato na hetuḥ syāt / ataḥ pūrva na kṛtam / niścitagrahaṇena sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko 'naikāntiko nirastaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:383_0: nanu ca sapakṣa eva sattvam ityukte,
SA15dhnyabpu:383_2: tat kimartha punarubhayorupādānaṃ kṛtam? ucyate anvayo vyatireko vā niyamavāneva prayoktavyo nānyathā ti darśayitu dvayorapyupādānaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:383_3: aniyate hi dvayorapi prayoge 'yamarthaḥ syāt- sapakṣe yo 'sti,
SA15dhnyabpu:383_4: vipakṣe ca yo nāsti ca heturiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:383_5: tathā ca sati sa śyāmaḥ tatputratvāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:383_6: dṛśyamāna putravat iti tatputratve hetuḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:383_9: niyamavatośca prayoge 'vaśyakartavye dvayoreka eva prayoktavyo na dvāviti niyamavānevānvaya vyatireko vā prayoktavyaḥ iti śikṣaṇārtha dvayorūpādānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:384_1: teṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam, tatra ko 'numeyaḥ? ityāha- anumeyo 'tretyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:384_2: atra hetulakṣaṇe niścetavye dharmī anumeyaḥ anyatra tu sādhyapratipattikāle samudāyo 'numeyaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:388_0: atreti / hetulakṣaṇe / jijñāsitaḥ pratyetumiṣṭaḥ / viśeṣa iti / vilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ / jijñāsito viśeṣo yasmin sa jijñāsitaviśeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:388_2: tena yasya dharmiṇaḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ pratyenumiṣṭaḥ so 'numeya ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:388_3: sa ca hetulakṣaṇāvasare eva bodhya ityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:390_0: samānaṃ mānamasyeti samānaḥ / samānajñānapariccedyaḥ / sadṛśa iti śeṣaḥ / yaśca sadṛśo 'rthaḥ sa sapakṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:391_4: pratyarthaniyamāt / tena ca samānatvād virodhaḥ syāditiṃ sādhyadharma sāmānyena ityuktamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:392_0: kaśca asapakṣaḥ? ityāśaṅkāyāmāha- na sapakṣa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:392_1: yaśca sapakṣo na bhavati sa sarva evāsapakṣa iti // 8 //
SA15dhnyabpu:393_0: tato 'nya iti / sapakṣaviruddhaḥ / yathā- uṣṇasparśe sādhye 'nuṣṇāśītaṃ dravyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:393_1: tu dharmo 'numeyaḥ- iti darśayitum atra grahaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:393_2: jijñāsito jñātumiṣṭo viśaṣo dharmo yasya dharmiṇaḥ sa yathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:394_1: samāno 'rthaḥ sapakṣaḥ / samānaḥ sadṛśo yo 'rthaḥ pakṣeṇa sa sapakṣa uktaḥ,

SA15dhnyabpu:395_3: na ca viśeṣaḥ sādhyaḥ, apitu sāmānyam / ata iha sāmānya sādhyamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:395_4: sādhyadahrmaścāsau sāmānyaṃ ceti sādhyadharma sāmānyena samānaḥ pakṣeṇa sapakṣa ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:396_0: ko 'sapakṣaḥ? ityāha- na sapakṣo 'sapakṣaḥ / sapakṣo yo na bhavati so 'sapakṣaḥ // 8 //
SA15dhnyabpu:397_0: kaśca sapakṣo na bhavati? ityāha- tata iti / tataḥ sapakṣād anyaḥ, tena
SA15dhnyabpu:401_0: taddiruddha iti / sapakṣaviruddhaḥ / yathā- uṣṇasparśa eva sādhye śītaṃ dravyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:401_1: tadbhāva iti / sapakṣābhāvaḥ / yathā- sauvāntikasya anityatve sādhye anityatvābhāva evāsapakṣaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:402_0: trividha evārthe na sapakṣaḥ asapakṣaḥ iti bodhyam /

SA15dhnyabpu:406_0: tatrānupalabdhiriti / anupalabdhisvarūpamucyate / yatheti / upapradarśanaśabdaḥ / pradeśaviśeṣe kvacid ghaṭo neti sannihitadeśavacanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:407_0: ca viruddhaḥ / tasya ca sapakṣasya abhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:407_1: sapakṣādanyatvaṃ tadviruddhatvaṃ ca na tāvat pratyetuṃ śakyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:409_0: uktena trairūpyeṇa trirūpāṇi ca trīṇyeva liṅgānīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:409_2: trairūpyamādau pṛṣṭam, trirūpāni ca liṅgāni pareṇa /
SA15dhnyabpu:409_3: tatra trairūpyamuktam, trirūpāṇi cocyante- trīṇyeva trīṇyeva trirūpāṇi liṅgāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:410_2: bidheyasya sādhyasya svabhāvaśca trirūpaḥ kārya ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:413_0: kvacid ghaṭo neti kvacidityanena dharmī nirdiśyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:413_3: deśa ityukte sarvasya pakṣatve ghaṭābhāvasiddhireva na syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:414_0: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyeti / anena heturviśeṣaṇamuktam / upalabdhiriti jñānamucyate / lakṣyate iti lakṣaṇam / viṣaya iti śeṣaḥ / upalabdherlakṣaṇamiti upalabdhilakṣaṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:416_0: nanu kā sā upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ? ityāśaṅkāyāmāha- upalabdhītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:417_2: tadāha- kvaciditi / pratipattṛpratyakṣeḥ kvacideva pradeśe iti dharmī /
SA15dhnyabpu:417_3: na ghaṭa iti sādhyam / upalabdhirjñānam / tasyā lakṣaṇaṃ janikā sāmagrī /
SA15dhnyabpu:418_0: atha yo yatra nāsti sa kathaṃ tatra dṛśyaḥ? dṛśyatvasamāropādasannapi dṛśya ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:418_1: yaścaivaṃ sambhāvyate- yadyasāvanna bhaved dṛśya eva bhavediti /
SA15dhnyabpu:418_3: kaścaivaṃ sambhāvyaḥ? yasya samagrāṇi svāvalambanadarśanakāraṇāni bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:418_4: kadā ca tāni samagrāṇi gamyante? yadā ekajñānavastvantaropalambhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:418_8: tasmādekajñānasaṃsargiṇi dṛśyamāne satyekasmin itarat samagradarśanasāmagrīkaṃ yadi bhaved,
SA15dhnyabpu:418_12: tadālambanaṃ ca jñānaṃ dṛśyānupalambhaniścayahetutvād dṛśyānupalambha ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:421_0: 14 yaḥ svabhāva satsvapyanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāva viśeṣaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:423_0: upalambha iti / jñānam / tasya pratyayāntarāṇi upalambhapratyayāntarāṇi /
SA15dhnyabpu:425_0: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ san cakṣurādisannidhāne viprakarṣaprakāratrayeṇa aviprakṛṣṭaḥ śakyadarśanaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:425_2: tena cakṣurādisannidhāne 'pi pratyakṣayogyaghaṭānupalabdheḥ atra ghaṭo nāsti ityayamartha ukta iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:427_2: jñānasya ghaṭo 'pi janakaḥ, anye ca cakṣurādayaḥ / ghaṭād dṛśyādanye hetavaḥ pratyayāntarāṇi,
SA15dhnyabpu:427_3: teṣāṃ {sāa}lyaṃ sannidhiḥ / svabhāva eva viśiṣyate tadanyasmādīt viśeṣo viśiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:427_4: tadayaṃ viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ pratyayāntarasākalpaṃ ca- etad dvayamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ ghaṭāderdraṣṭavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:428_0: kīdṛśaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ? ityāha- yaḥ svabhāva ityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:429_0: satsvityādi / upalambhasya yāni ghaṭād dṛśyāt pratyayāntarāṇi teṣu satsu vidyamāneṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:430_1: tathā ca sati draṣṭuṃ pravṛttasyaikasya draṣṭurddaśayamāna ubhayavān bhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:430_3: yairhi pratyayaiḥ sa draṣṭā paśyati te sannihitāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:430_4: ataśca sannihitā yad draṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ saḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:591_0: yadi prayogabhedādeṣa bhedaḥ, parāthānumāne vaktavya eṣaḥ, śabdabhedo hi prayogabhedaḥ, śabdaśca parārthānumānam? ityāśaṅkayāha- prayogadarśanetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:593_0: 45 sarvatra cāsyāmabhavavyavahrasādhanyāmanupalabdhau yeṣāṃ svabhāvaviruddhādīnāmupalabdhyā kāraṇādīnāmanupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktaḥ,

SA15dhnyabpu:597_1: dṛśyaniṣedhe svabhāvānupalabdhiprayogaprasaṅgāt tathā ca sati na teṣāṃ dṛśyānupalabdheniṣedhaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:597_2: tat kathameṣāṃ prayogāṇāṃ dṛśyānupalabdhāvantarbhāvaḥ? ityāha sarvatra cetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:597_6: sarvatra ceti / ca śabdo hiśabdasyārthe / yasmāt sarvatrānupalabdhau yeṣāṃ pratiṣedha uktasteṣāmupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ dṛśyānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:599_2: atrāpi cakāro hetvarthaḥ / yasmād ye virodhinaḥ vyāpya- vyāpakabhūtāḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtāśca jñātāḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:601_0: lakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ syāt, tadā kāryādeḥ pratiṣedhasiddhiḥ sambhavati, nānyatra // 45 //
SA15dhnyabpu:603_2: virodhābhāvo 'pyasiddhaḥ, kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'siddhaḥ, kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvo 'pyasiddhaḥ- ityetat pradarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:604_0: veditavyā= jñātavyā / upalabdhyanupalabdhī ca dveyeṣāṃ staḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:604_1: te dṛśyā eva / tasmāt svabhāpraviruddhādyu palabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā copalabdhyanupalabdhimatāṃ viruddhādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyānāmeva kṛto draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:605_0: bahuṣu codyeṣu prakrānteṣu parihārasamuccayārthaścakāro hetvartho bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:606_0: kasmāt punaḥ pratiṣedhyānāṃ viruddhādīnāmupalabdhyanupalabdhī veditavye? ityāha- anyeṣāmiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:606_1: upalabdhyanupalabdhimadbhayo 'nye 'nupalabdhā eva ye teṣāṃ virodhaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca kenacit saha abhāvaśca vyāpyasya vyāpakasyābhāve na sidhyati,
SA15dhnyabpu:606_2: yasmāt tato virodhakāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāsiddhe kāraṇād upalabdhyanupalabdhimanta eva viruddhādayo niṣedhyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:606_3: ubhayavatnaśca dṛśyā eva / tasmād dṛśyānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:607_0: tadayamarthaḥ- virodhaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca vyāpakābhāve vyāpyābhāvaśca dṛśyānupalabdhereveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:607_3: vyāpakābhimatābhāve ca vyāpyābhimatābhāve niścite niścito vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:607_5: iha gṛhīte vṛkṣābhāve hi śiśapātvābhāvapratītau pratīto vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:607_7: tasmādvirodham, kāryakāraṇabhāvam, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ ca smaratā virodha kāryakāarṇabhāva vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaviṣayābhāvapratipattinibandhanaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ smartavyā /
SA15dhnyabpu:609_0: tathāhi- upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya niyatānuṣaṅgīṇo ye dṛṣṭāstatsannidhāne kasyacit tirobhāve tena saha virodhasya pratyāyanaṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:610_1: tadabhāve nopalabhyate / tattasmādutpadayate iti taddvayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo niścīyate /

SA15dhnyabpu:626_0: ākhyāyate 'neneti ākhyānam / vacanamiti / trīṇi rūpāṇi santi yasya tat trirūpam /

SA15dhnyabpu:640_11: yathā ākāśam, śabdastu kṛtakaḥ iti kṛtakatvākṛtakatvakṛtaṃ śabdākāśayoḥ sādhya dṛṣṭāntadharmoṇorasādṛśyamihābhidheyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:643_0: 8 tatra sādharmyavatprayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate so 'dvayava hāraviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:643_2: nopalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśaṣe upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭaḥ- ityanupalabdhiprayogaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:644_3: tat kasmāt prayogabhedena dvividhamityucyate iti cet? tatrāha nānayoriti /
SA15dhnyabpu:646_0: anyatra prayogabhedāditi / iha prayogasyaiva bhedaḥ, na tu sarvathāpi / tathā hi- prathame vastuto 'nvayābhidhāne 'pi vyatirekaḥ sāmarthyādavagamyate /

SA15dhnyabpu:650_0: 9 tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ- yat sat tat sarvamanityam,
SA15dhnyabpu:651_4: parīkṣita iti śeṣaḥ / tena dṛṣṭāntakathanaṃ nopalabhyate iti anena pakṣadharma uktaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:660_1: ātmabhūtadharmasyaiva bhedaṃ kṛtvā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:664_1: tasya bhedena / bhedaṃ hetūkṛtya prayogaḥ / anutpannebhyo hi vyāvṛtimāśrityotpanno bhāva ityucyate /

SA15dhnyabpu:738_0: atha tacca sādharmya kīdṛśamiti cet? āha- asatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:739_0: yadi sādhyena hetoranvayo na syāt tadā sādhyābhāve 'pi hetorabhāvaḥ katham syāt // 29 //
SA15dhnyabpu:740_0: anvayābhāve vyatireko 'siddha ityetat kasmāditi cet? tatrāha- nahītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:740_1: yadi svabhāvapratibandha ātmā svarūpeṇa pratibandho na syāt tadā ekanivṛttāvapi aparasya nivṛttirniyamena na syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:741_1: sarvasyaiva padārthasya yaḥ ko 'pi pratibandho yogyaḥ samupalabhyate sa sarvaḥ prakāradvaya evāntarbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:742_0: tatheti / yathā anvayavākye, tathā arthādeva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyābhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:743_0: katham? asati tasmin anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddhe ranavasāyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:743_1: hetvabhāve sādhyābhāvaṃ niyataṃ vyatirekavākyādavasyatā hetuḥ sambhave sādhyābhāvo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:743_2: itarathā hetvabhāve niyato na syāt pratītaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:744_1: tathāpi kimīt hetusambhave sādhyasambhavaḥ? ityāha- nahīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:744_2: svabhāvena pratibandho yastsminnasatyekasya sādhyasya nivṛttyā nāparasya sādhanasya niyamena yuktā niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:745_1: tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:745_3: yo yatra pratibaddhastasya sa pratibandhaviṣayo 'rthaḥ svabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vāsyat anyasmin prasiddhatvānupapatteḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:746_2_0: yacca pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvayavacanamiyekenāpi vākyena anvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya
SA15dhnyabpu:747_0: miti tasya ātmā tadātmā, tadātmano bhāvastādātmyam, tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yaḥ sa tādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:750_1: tena sādhyasya nivṛttau sādhanasya nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho nivarttya nivartakayordarśanīyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:750_2: yadi hi sādhanaṃ sādhye pratibaddham bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:750_5: tasmāt sādhyanivṛtau yat sādhana nivṛttivacanaṃ tenākṣiptaṃ pratibandhopadarśanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:750_8: na vaktavyastarhi anvayaḥ / yasmāt dṛṣṭānte pramāṇena pratibandho darśyamāna evānvayaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:750_9: nāparaḥ kaścit, tasmāt nivartya nivartakayoḥ pratibandho jñātavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:750_10: tathā ca anvaya eva jñāto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:750_11: itiśabdo hetau / yasmādanvaye 'pi vyatirekagatiḥ vyatireke cānvayagatiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:750_12: tasmādekenāpi sapakṣe cāsapakṣe ca sattvāsattvayoḥ khyāpanaṃ kṛtam /
