SA15dhnyabpu:758_1: evaṃ ca pakṣānirdheśābhāva eva kalpyata iti cet? tatrāha- dvayorapīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:759_0: avaśyameva pakṣo nidehsyaḥ iti yo niyamaḥ, sa tu nāsti // 34 //

SA15dhnyabpu:762_2: yat sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ pratītaṃ tata eva sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭāt sādhyapratītiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:763_1: nopalabhyate cātrāpi upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti sāmarthyādeva iha ghaṭo nāstīti bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:764_0: 36 tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi yaḥ sadvayavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaḥ sa upalabhyata eva /

SA15dhnyabpu:765_0: upalabdhilakṣaṇarpāpto yāvānnopalabhyate sa sarvo 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti nikhilapadārthosaṃhāreṇa anvayaḥ kārya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:765_1: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānvayo yatra ca pakṣadharmaḥ ityetayonirdeśa tacca sādhyaṃ tatra sāmarthyena siddhayatīti pakṣanirdeśasya kiṃ praojanam? /
SA15dhnyabpu:766_0: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇa yo vyatirekanirdeśaḥ pakṣadharmaśceti tadubhayasāmarthyena pratijñāpratītenaṃ pratijñānirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:766_2: yadā sāmarthyena pratijñārthapratītirjāyate tadā pratijñāvacanaśravaṇe uparodhenāpi ka āgrahī syāt /

SA15dhnyabpu:766_6: sādharmyavati prayoge 'pi sāmarthyādeva neha pradeśe ghaṭaḥ iti bhavati /

SA15dhnyabpu:767_4: yadi ca sādhyadharmastatra sādhyadharmiṇi na bhavet,

SA15dhnyabpu:769_5: yadi ca sādhyadharmaḥ sādhyadharmiṇi na syāt sādhana
SA15dhnyabpu:774_0: bhidhānārthe pakṣanirdeśe ca doṣaḥ ko 'pi nāsti /

SA15dhnyabpu:780_0: dharmo 'pi na bhavet / asti ca sādhanadharma iti sāmarthyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:780_1: ataḥ sāmarthyāt nāstyatra ghaṭa iti pratītena pakṣanirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:780_2: evaṃ kārya svabhāvahetvorapi samarthyāt sampratyaya iti na pakṣanirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:781_0: kīdṛśaḥ punararthaḥ pakṣa iti / anena śabdena nirdeśyo vaktavyaḥ?: iti // 37 //
SA15dhnyabpu:782_0: āpa-svarūpeṇaiveti / sādhyatvenaiva / svayamiti vādinā / iṣṭa iti / nokta eva, api tviṣṭo 'pītyarthaḥ / evambhūtaḥ san pratyakṣādibhiḥ anirākṛto yo 'rthaḥ sa pakṣa ityucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:783_0: atha yadi pakṣo na nirdeśyaḥ, kathamanirdeśyasya lakṣaṇamuktam? na sādhanavākyāvayavatvādasya lakṣaṇamuktam,
SA15dhnyabpu:783_1: api tvasādhye kecit sādhyam, sādhyaṃ cā sādhyamiti / kecit pratipannāḥ, tatsādhyāsādhyapratipattinirākaraṇārtha pakṣalakṣaṇamuktam /

SA15dhnyabpu:786_1: śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyaṃ bhavatīti na puanratra sādhyatvenaiveṣṭam,
SA15dhnyabpu:790_0: yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'nityaḥ ityucyamāne tacca cākṣuṣatvaṃ śabde 'siddhamiti sādhyaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:791_0: yadi tasmin sādhyarūpamastyeva, kasmānna pakṣa iti ced? āha- atreti /
SA15dhnyabpu:792_2: sādhanarūpatāpyasti / tasmāt sādhyatve 'pi atiriktasādhanarūpasattvādadhikavacanasya pakṣatvaṃ nirastam /

SA15dhnyabpu:794_0: pratyavamraṣṭavyaḥ, tat kimartha svarūpaśabdena saha pratyavamuṣṭaḥ? ucyateḥ evaśabdo nipāto dayotakaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:794_1: padāntarābhihitasyarthasya viśeṣa dayotayati- iti padāntareṇa viśeṣyavācinā saha nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:794_2: na sādhanatvenāpīti / yat sādhanatvena nirdhiṣṭaṃ tat sādhanatveneṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:795_0: tadudāharati- yatheti / śabdayānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyam ityanena sādhyatveneṣṭimāha /
SA15dhnyabpu:795_1: tad iti cakṣuṣatvam / iheti śabde / sādhyatvenaiveṣṭamiti / sādhyatveneṣṭiniyamābhāvamāha /

SA15dhnyabpu:796_1: svayaṃśabdo nipātaḥ ātmanaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhayantasya ātmanā iti ca tṛtīyāntasyārthe vartate /
SA15dhnyabpu:796_4: vādī ca pratyāsannaḥ / tato yasya vādina ātmā tṛtīyārtha yuktaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:796_6: na tu svayaṃśabdasya vādinā ityeṣa paryāyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:797_0: kaḥ punarasau vādī? ityāha- yastadeti / vādakāle, sādhanamāha / aneka
SA15dhnyabpu:798_0: 44 etena yadayapi kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanamaha,
SA15dhnyabpu:798_1: taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame 'pīti yastadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:799_0: 45 iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanamupanyastaṃ tasya siddhimiccatā so 'nukto pi vacanena sādhyo bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:800_0: teneti vādinā nirdeśya eva pakṣa ucyate // 43 //
SA15dhnyabpu:801_0: kaścit kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ pakṣe kṛtaniścaya eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:801_1: astu tādṛśo niścayaḥ, tathāpi yadi śāstrāduddhṛtya pramāṇikriyate iti śeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:802_0: vādī yasmin śāstre sādhanaṃ kathayati taccāstrakāreṇa vitarkaviṣayadharmiṇi yadi bahavo dharmā aṅgīkriyante,
SA15dhnyabpu:802_1: tathāpi ca / vādinaiva yo dharma sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:802_2: śāstrakāreroṣṭastu na yasmād vādinā nirdeśyasya pakṣatvamaṅgīkriyate tasmād vādinā śāstrāṅgīkāradvāreṇopakārako yo dharmaḥ pariṣkartumiṣyate sa eva sādhyaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:803_1: vādino viśeṣaṇametat / yadayavam, vādinaḥ iṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ ityuktam,
SA15dhnyabpu:803_2: etena ca kimuktena? anena tadā vādakāle tena vādinā svayaṃ yo dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:803_3: sa eva sādhyaḥ, netaro dharmaḥ- ityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:804_2: yaccāstraṃ tena vādinābhyupagataṃ taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin sādhyadharmiṇi anekasya dharmasyābhyupagame sati anyadharmasādhyatvasambhavaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:804_3: tathā hi- śāstraṃ yenābhyupagataṃ tatsiddho dharmaḥ sarva eva tena sādhya ityasti vipratipattiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:804_4: anenāpāsyate / anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi sati sa eva sādhyo yo vādinā iṣṭaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:805_1: ato 'napekṣaṇīyatvānna śāstra sthitvā vādaḥ kartavyaḥ? satyamḥ āhopuruṣikayā tu yadayapi kvaciccāstre sthita iti kiñciccāstramabhyupagataḥ sādhanamāha,
SA15dhnyabpu:805_2: tathāpi ya eva tasyeṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ iti jñāpanāyedamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:806_0: iṣṭaśabdamukṣipya vyācaṣṭe- iṣṭa iti / yatrārtha ātmani viruddho
SA15dhnyabpu:809_0: atra ātmārthā ityanukte 'pi ātmārthataiva sādhyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:810_0: iṣṭaśabdārtha ākhyāyate / yasmin vastuni vivāda utpannaḥ,

SA15dhnyabpu:1256_1: aprigrahāgrahayogāditi / atra vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam- yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:1257_0: ṛgvedaḥ, yajurvedaḥ, sāmavedaśceti trayo vedāḥ / ta eva trayī śabdenocyante / trayī vettīti trayīvit / grāhyaṃ vacanamasyeti grāhyavacanaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1257_1: prāmāṇyavacana iti śeṣaḥ / tenatadukta bhavati- trayīvid yo brāmhaṇastadabhimatapuruṣavacanaṃ nityapramāṇaṃ nāstīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1257_2: atreti / tadarthastu gata eva / ye hi grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1257_3: tadyatheti / gautama vyāsamuniprabhṛttibhiryāni dharmaśāstrāṇi praṇītāniv tāni hi trayīvidāṃ prāmāṇyavacanāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:1259_0: sandigdha ubhayorvyatireko yasminniti samāsaḥ / udāharaṇam- yatheti /

SA15dhnyabpu:1261_4: tathapi ki sarāgā uta vītarāgāḥ? iti sandehaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:1262_4: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yatra sāhdyābhāva sādhanābhavo darśayitavyaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:1263_2: na sa vaktā /yathā upalakhaṇḍa iti / yadayapyupalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛtaṃ tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddheravyatirekaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:1271_5_0: kathamayamavyatireko yāvatopalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ nivṛtam? kimataḥ? yadyapi upalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyavṛttam- sarāgatvaṃ vītarāgatvaṃ

SA15dhnyabpu:1276_1: ākāśavat ityukta, tatra vyatireko vidyamāno 'pyanukta eva bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1276_2: tathāhi yadi ye ye ca apdārthā nityāḥ te sarva evākṛtakāḥ ityucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1277_1: anityaḥ śabda iti / anityatvaṃ sādhkyam / kṛtakatvāditi het / ākaśavaditi vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1278_1: sa śuddho 'pi svato yadi pareṇāśuddhaḥ khyāpyate sa tāvad yathā prakāśitastathā na yuktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1278_3: parkāśitaśca hetuḥ / ato vakturaparādhādapi parāthānumāne heturdṛṣṭānto vā duṣṭāḥ syādapi /

SA15dhnyabpu:1278_11: na ca tathā sādhakaḥ / vyatirekaviṣayatvena sa sādhakaḥ na ca tathopanyasta iti ayamapradarśitavyatireko vakturaparādhād duṣṭāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1279_0: viparīto vyatireko yasmin vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1279_4: tadā vyatirekavākye sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato darśayitavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1279_5: evaṃ hi hetuḥ sādhyaniyato darśitaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1279_6: yadi tu sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato nākhyāyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1279_8: tathā ca sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ na pratīyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:1279_10: viparītavyatireke ca sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāve niyata ucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1279_12: tathā hi- yadakṛtakamiti / sādhanābhāvamanūdaya / tannityamiti sādhyābhāvavidhiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1280_1: tathā ca sati akṛtakatvaṃ nityatve sādhyābhāve niyatamuktam,
